                  status_tag fee_detail.verification_status
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                column "关联工单" do |fee_detail|
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  latest_wo = fee_detail.latest_associated_work_order
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  if latest_wo
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    link_to "##{latest_wo.id}", [:admin, latest_wo]
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  else
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    "无"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                column "问题类型" do |fee_detail|
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  latest_wo = fee_detail.latest_associated_work_order
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  if latest_wo && latest_wo.problem_types.any?
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    problem_details = latest_wo.problem_types.map do |problem_type|
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                      "#{problem_type.legacy_problem_code}-#{problem_type.title}-#{problem_type.sop_description}+#{problem_type.standard_handling}"
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    end.join("\n")
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                    content_tag(:pre, problem_details,
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                      class: "problem-type-plain-text",
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                      style: "white-space: pre-wrap; margin: 0; font-family: monospace; font-size: 12px;")
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  else
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                    "无"
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                end
          
      216.

                actions

                  tab "关联工单 (#{resource.work_orders.count})" do
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                    panel "关联工单信息" do
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                      if resource.work_orders.any?
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

                        table_for resource.work_orders.includes(:reimbursement) do
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

                          column "工单ID" do |work_order|
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                            case work_order.type
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                            when 'AuditWorkOrder'
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                              link_to work_order.id, admin_audit_work_order_path(work_order)
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                            when 'CommunicationWorkOrder'
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                              link_to work_order.id, admin_communication_work_order_path(work_order)
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

                            when 'ExpressReceiptWorkOrder'
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

                              link_to work_order.id, admin_express_receipt_work_order_path(work_order)
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

                            else
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                              "##{work_order.id} (类型: #{work_order.type})"
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                            end
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

                          end
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

                          column "工单类型", :type
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

                          column "工单状态" do |work_order|
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

                            status_tag work_order.status if work_order.status.present?
          
      355.

            ActiveAdmin.register_page "Operation Statistics" do

              1
            

            

              menu label: "操作统计", priority: 10

                      pie_chart WorkOrderOperation.group(:operation_type).count.transform_keys { |k|

                      }
          
      12.

                    end

                columns do

                  column do

                  end
          
      30.

      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                panel "操作排行榜" do
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  table_for AdminUser.joins(:work_order_operations)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                                    .select('admin_users.*, COUNT(work_order_operations.id) as operations_count')
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                                    .group('admin_users.id')
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                                    .order('operations_count DESC')
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                                    .limit(10) do
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    column :email
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    column "操作数量" do |admin_user|
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      admin_user.operations_count
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43.

                end

    44. 
            

            

              end

            end

                def apply_sorting(chain)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  # 检查是否是has_updates字段的排序
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  if params[:order].present? && params[:order].include?('has_updates')
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    # 提取排序方向
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    direction = params[:order].include?('_desc') ? 'DESC' : 'ASC'
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    # 应用自定义排序逻辑
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    return chain.order(
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                      Arel.sql("has_updates #{direction}, last_update_at DESC NULLS LAST")
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    )
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  # 对于其他字段，使用默认的排序逻辑

    79.

              1
            

            

              scope :pending, show_count: false do |reimbursements|

              1
            

            

              scope :processing, show_count: false do |reimbursements|
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                reimbursements.assigned_to_user(current_admin_user.id).where(status: 'processing')
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :closed, show_count: false do |reimbursements|
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                reimbursements.assigned_to_user(current_admin_user.id).where(status: 'closed')
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              # 未分配的报销单 - 所有人都可以看到
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :unassigned, show_count: false do |reimbursements|
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                reimbursements.left_joins(:active_assignment).where(reimbursement_assignments: { id: nil }, status: 'pending')
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              # 批量操作
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              # 批量分配报销单 - 基于Policy的权限控制
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
              1
            

            

              batch_action :assign_to,
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                           title: "批量分配报销单",
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                           if: proc {
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                             ReimbursementPolicy.new(current_admin_user).can_batch_assign?
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                           },
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                           form: -> {
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                {
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  assignee: AdminUser.available.map { |u| [u.email, u.id] },
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  notes: :text
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                }
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              } do |ids, inputs|
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                service = ReimbursementAssignmentService.new(current_admin_user)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                results = service.batch_assign(ids, inputs[:assignee], inputs[:notes])
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                redirect_to collection_path, notice: "成功分配 #{results.size} 个报销单"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              # 操作按钮 - 基于Policy的权限控制
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              1
            

            

              action_item :import, only: :index, if: proc {
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                ReimbursementPolicy.new(current_admin_user).can_import?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              } do
          
      172.

                link_to "导入报销单", new_import_admin_reimbursements_path
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            
          
      175.

              action_item :import_operation_histories, only: :index, if: proc {

              # 添加自定义按钮，按照指定顺序排列 - 基于Policy的权限控制
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
              1
            

            

              action_item :new_audit_work_order, only: :show, priority: 0, if: proc {
          
      187.

                !resource.closed? && ReimbursementPolicy.new(current_admin_user).can_create?

      191.

      192.

      193.

                        method: :delete,
          
      209.

    214. 
            

            

                resource.processing? && !resource.closed? && ReimbursementPolicy.new(current_admin_user).can_update?
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              } do
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                link_to "处理完成", close_admin_reimbursement_path(resource), method: :put, data: { confirm: "确定要完成处理此报销单吗 (状态将变为 Closed)?" }
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

              end
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

              # ADDED: "取消完成" (Reopen) button
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
              1
            

            

              action_item :reopen_reimbursement, label: "取消完成", only: :show, priority: 4, if: proc {
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                resource.closed? && ReimbursementPolicy.new(current_admin_user).can_update?

              } do
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                link_to "取消完成", reopen_reimbursement_admin_reimbursement_path(resource), method: :put, data: { confirm: "确定要取消完成此报销单吗 (状态将变为 Processing)?" }
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

              end
          
      225.

              # Manual Override Controls - 手动状态覆盖控制按钮
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
              1
            

            

              action_item :manual_override_section, label: "手动状态控制", only: :show, priority: 10, if: proc {
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                ReimbursementPolicy.new(current_admin_user).can_manual_override?
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              } do
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                content_tag :div, class: "manual-override-controls", style: "margin: 10px 0; padding: 10px; border: 2px solid #ff6b35; border-radius: 5px; background-color: #fff3f0;" do
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  content_tag(:h4, "⚠️ 手动状态覆盖控制", style: "margin: 0 0 10px 0; color: #ff6b35;") +
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  content_tag(:p, "注意：手动状态更改将覆盖系统自动逻辑，请谨慎使用！", style: "margin: 0 0 10px 0; font-size: 12px; color: #666;") +
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  content_tag(:div, class: "button-group") do
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                    [
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                      link_to("设为待处理", manual_set_pending_admin_reimbursement_path(resource),
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                              method: :put, class: "button",
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                              data: { confirm: "确定要手动设置状态为'待处理'吗？这将覆盖系统逻辑。" },
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                              style: "margin-right: 5px; background-color: #ffa500; color: white; padding: 5px 10px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 3px;"),
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                      link_to("设为处理中", manual_set_processing_admin_reimbursement_path(resource),
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                              method: :put, class: "button",
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                              data: { confirm: "确定要手动设置状态为'处理中'吗？这将覆盖系统逻辑。" },
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                              style: "margin-right: 5px; background-color: #007bff; color: white; padding: 5px 10px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 3px;"),
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                      link_to("设为已关闭", manual_set_closed_admin_reimbursement_path(resource),
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                              method: :put, class: "button",
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                              data: { confirm: "确定要手动设置状态为'已关闭'吗？这将覆盖系统逻辑。" },
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                              style: "margin-right: 5px; background-color: #28a745; color: white; padding: 5px 10px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 3px;"),
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                      (link_to("重置手动覆盖", reset_manual_override_admin_reimbursement_path(resource),

                               method: :put, class: "button",
          
      249.

      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                               style: "background-color: #6c757d; color: white; padding: 5px 10px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 3px;") if resource.manual_override?)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                    ].compact.join(" ").html_safe
          
      252.

      253.

                end

      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

              # 导入操作
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
              1
            

            

              collection_action :new_import, method: :get do
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                render "admin/shared/import_form_with_progress", locals: {
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  title: "导入报销单",
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                  import_path: import_admin_reimbursements_path,
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  cancel_path: admin_reimbursements_path,
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                  instructions: [
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                    "请上传CSV或Excel格式文件",
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    "文件必须包含以下列：报销单单号,单据名称,报销单申请人,报销单申请人工号,申请人公司,申请人部门,收单状态,收单日期,关联申请单号,提交报销日期,记账日期,报销单状态 (此列的值将导入到外部状态字段),当前审批节点,当前审批人,报销单审核通过日期,审核通过人,报销金额（单据币种）,弹性字段2,当前审批节点转入时间,首次提交时间,单据标签,弹性字段8",
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                    "如果报销单已存在（根据报销单单号判断），将更新现有记录",
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                    "如果报销单不存在，将创建新记录",
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                    "⚡ 已启用批量优化，大文件导入速度提升30-40倍"
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                }
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

              end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
              1
            

            

              collection_action :import, method: :post do
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                # 确保文件参数存在
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                unless params[:file].present?
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                   redirect_to new_import_admin_reimbursements_path, alert: "请选择要导入的文件。"
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                   return
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                # 使用优化后的批量报销单导入服务
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                service = SimpleBatchReimbursementImportService.new(params[:file], current_admin_user)
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                result = service.import
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

            
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                if result[:success]
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  # 增强的成功消息，包含详细统计信息
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                  notice_message = "🎉 报销单导入成功完成！"
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                  notice_message += " 📊 处理结果: #{result[:created]}条新增, #{result[:updated]}条更新"
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                  notice_message += ", #{result[:errors]}条错误记录" if result[:errors].to_i > 0
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                  
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                  # 添加性能信息
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                  if result[:processing_time]
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                    processing_time = result[:processing_time].round(2)
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                    total_records = (result[:created].to_i + result[:updated].to_i)
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                    if total_records > 0 && processing_time > 0
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                      records_per_second = (total_records / processing_time).round(0)
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                      notice_message += " ⚡ 处理速度: #{records_per_second}条/秒, 耗时#{processing_time}秒"
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                    end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                  end
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                  
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursements_path, notice: notice_message
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                else
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                  # 增强的错误消息，提供更清晰的错误信息
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                  error_msg = result[:error_details] ? result[:error_details].join(', ') : result[:errors]
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                  alert_message = "❌ 报销单导入失败: #{error_msg}"
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                  redirect_to new_import_admin_reimbursements_path, alert: alert_message
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

              end
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

            
          
      307.

              # CSV 导出配置
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
              1
            

            

              csv do
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                column("报销单单号") { |reimbursement| reimbursement.invoice_number }
          
      310.

                column("单据名称") { |reimbursement| reimbursement.document_name }
          
      311.

      312.

      315.

                    attributes_table do

                      row :id

      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            

            

            
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            

            

                    panel "费用明细信息" do
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            

            

                      table_for resource.fee_details.includes(:work_orders).order(
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            

            

                        Arel.sql("CASE WHEN verification_status = 'problematic' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END"),
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            

            

                        created_at: :desc
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            

            

                      ) do
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            

            

                        column("费用明细id") { |fd| link_to fd.id, admin_fee_detail_path(fd) }
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            

            

                        column "关联工单" do |fee_detail|
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            

            

                          latest_wo = fee_detail.latest_associated_work_order
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            

                          if latest_wo
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            

                            link_to "##{latest_wo.id}", [:admin, latest_wo]
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            

                          else
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            

                            "无"
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            

                          end
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            

                        end
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            

                        column "验证状态", :verification_status do |fd| status_tag fd.verification_status end
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            

            

                        column :fee_type
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            

                        column "费用日期", :fee_date do |fd|
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            

                          fd.fee_date&.strftime("%Y-%m-%d") || "未设置"
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            

                        end
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            

                        column "金额", :amount do |fd| number_to_currency(fd.amount, unit: "¥") end
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            

                        column "问题类型" do |fee_detail|
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            

                          latest_wo = fee_detail.latest_associated_work_order
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            

                          if latest_wo && latest_wo.problem_types.any?
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            

                            problem_details = latest_wo.problem_types.map do |problem_type|
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            

                              "#{problem_type.legacy_problem_code}-#{problem_type.title}-#{problem_type.sop_description}+#{problem_type.standard_handling}"
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            

                            end.join("\n")
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            

                            
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            

                            content_tag(:pre, problem_details,
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            

                              class: "problem-type-plain-text",
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            

            

                              style: "white-space: pre-wrap; margin: 0; font-family: monospace; font-size: 12px;")

      677.

                          total_attachments = fee_details_with_attachments.sum(&:attachment_count)

      679. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    679. 
            

            

                          span "总附件数: #{total_attachments}个"
          
      680. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    680. 
            

            

                          br
          
      681. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    681. 
            

            

                          span "总大小: #{number_to_human_size(total_size)}"
          
      682. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    682. 
            

            

                        end
          
      683. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    683. 
            

            

                        
          
      684. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    684. 
            

            

                        table_for fee_details_with_attachments do
          
      685. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    685. 
            

            

                          column "费用明细ID" do |fd|
          
      686. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    686. 
            

            

                            link_to fd.id, admin_fee_detail_path(fd)
          
      687. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    687. 
            

            

                          end
          
      688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    688. 
            

            

                          column "费用类型", :fee_type
          
      689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    689. 
            

            

                          column "金额", :amount do |fd|
          
      690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    690. 
            

            

                            number_to_currency(fd.amount, unit: "¥")
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            

            

                          end
          
      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            

            

                          column "附件概览" do |fd|
          
      693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    693. 
            

            

                            div class: "attachment-preview", style: "display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 10px;" do
          
      694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    694. 
            

            

                              fd.attachments.limit(3).each do |attachment|
          
      695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    695. 
            

            

                                div class: "attachment-item", style: "border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 8px; border-radius: 3px; max-width: 120px;" do
          
      696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    696. 
            

            

                                  if attachment.image?
          
      697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    697. 
            

            

                                    image_tag attachment.variant(resize_to_limit: [60, 60]),
          
      698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    698. 
            

            

                                             style: "max-width: 60px; height: auto; display: block; margin-bottom: 5px;"
          
      699. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    699. 
            

            

                                  else
          
      700. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    700. 
            

            

                                    div style: "text-align: center; padding: 15px; background: #f5f5f5;" do
          
      701. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    701. 
            

            

                                      case attachment.content_type
          
      702. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    702. 
            

            

                                      when 'application/pdf'
          
      703. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    703. 
            

            

                                        span "📄", style: "font-size: 20px;"
          
      704. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    704. 
            

            

                                      when /word/
          
      705. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    705. 
            

            

                                        span "📝", style: "font-size: 20px;"
          
      706. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    706. 
            

            

                                      when /excel|sheet/
          
      707. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    707. 
            

            

                                        span "📊", style: "font-size: 20px;"
          
      708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    708. 
            

            

                                      else
          
      709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    709. 
            

            

                                        span "📎", style: "font-size: 20px;"
          
      710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    710. 
            

            

                                      end
          
      711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    711. 
            

            

                                    end
          
      712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    712. 
            

            

                                  end
          
      713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    713. 
            

            

                                  
          
      714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    714. 
            

            

                                  div style: "font-size: 11px; text-align: center;" do
          
      715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    715. 
            

            

                                    div truncate(attachment.filename.to_s, length: 15)
          
      716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    716. 
            

            

                                    div "#{number_to_human_size(attachment.byte_size)}", style: "color: #666;"
          
      717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    717. 
            

            

                                  end
          
      718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    718. 
            

            

                                  
          
      719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    719. 
            

            

                                  div style: "text-align: center; margin-top: 5px;" do
          
      720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    720. 
            

            

                                    link_to "下载", rails_blob_path(attachment, disposition: "attachment"),
          
      721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    721. 
            

            

                                            class: "button small", style: "font-size: 10px; padding: 2px 6px;"
          
      722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    722. 
            

            

                                  end
          
      723. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    723. 
            

            

                                end
          
      724. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    724. 
            

            

                              end
          
      725. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    725. 
            

            

                              
          
      726. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    726. 
            

            

                              if fd.attachment_count > 3
          
      727. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    727. 
            

            

                                div style: "display: flex; align-items: center; color: #666; font-size: 12px;" do
          
      728. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    728. 
            

            

                                  "还有 #{fd.attachment_count - 3} 个附件..."
          
      729. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    729. 
            

            

                                end
          
      730. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    730. 
            

            

                              end
          
      731. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    731. 
            

            

                            end
          
      732. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    732. 
            

            

                          end
          
      733. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    733. 
            

            

                          column "附件统计" do |fd|
          
      734. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    734. 
            

            

                            div do
          
      735. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    735. 
            

            

                              strong "#{fd.attachment_count}个文件"
          
      736. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    736. 
            

            

                              br
          
      737. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    737. 
            

            

                              span "#{number_to_human_size(fd.attachment_total_size)}"
          
      738. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    738. 
            

            

                              br
          
      739. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    739. 
            

            

                              small fd.attachment_types_summary, style: "color: #666;"
          
      740. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    740. 
            

            

                            end
          
      741. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    741. 
            

            

                          end
          
      742. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    742. 
            

            

                        end
          
      743. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    743. 
            

            

                      else
          
      744. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    744. 
            

            

                        para "该报销单暂无附件", style: "text-align: center; color: #999; padding: 40px;"
          
      745. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    745. 
            

            

                      end
          
      746. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    746. 
            

            

                    end
          
      747. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    747. 
            

            

                  end
          
      748. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    748. 
            

            

                end
          
      749. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    749. 
            

            

                
          
      750. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    750. 
            

            

              end
          
      751. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    751. 
            

            

            
          
      752. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    752. 
            

            

              # 表单页 - 基于权限的表单字段控制
          
      753. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    753. 
            
              1
            

            

              form do |f|
          
      754. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    754. 
            

            

                policy = ReimbursementPolicy.new(current_admin_user)

    755. 
            

            

            
          
      756. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    756. 
            

            

                f.inputs "报销单信息" do
          
      757.

                  f.input :invoice_number, input_html: { readonly: !f.object.new_record? }
          
      758.

                  f.input :document_name if policy.can_update?
          
      759.

                  f.input :applicant if policy.can_update?
          
      760.

                  f.input :applicant_id if policy.can_update?
          
      761.

                  f.input :company if policy.can_update?
          
      762. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    762. 
            

            

                  f.input :department if policy.can_update?
          
      763. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    763. 
            

            

                  f.input :amount, min: 0.01 if policy.can_update?
          
      764. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    764. 
            

            

                  f.input :status, label: "内部状态", as: :select,
          
      765. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    765. 
            

            

                          collection: Reimbursement.state_machines[:status].states.map(&:value),
          
      766. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    766. 
            

            

                          include_blank: false if policy.can_update?
          
      767. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    767. 
            

            

                  f.input :external_status, label: "外部状态", as: :select,
          
      768. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    768. 
            

            

                          collection: ["审批中", "已付款", "待付款", "待审核"],
          
      769. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    769. 
            

            

                          include_blank: false if policy.can_update?
          
      770. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    770. 
            

            

                  f.input :receipt_status, as: :select, collection: ["pending", "received"] if policy.can_update?
          
      771.

                  f.input :receipt_date, as: :datepicker if policy.can_update?

      777.

      779.

                end
          
      780. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    780. 
            

            

            
          
      781. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    781. 
            

            

                # 手动覆盖信息 - 仅对有权限的用户显示

                if policy.can_manual_override?

      788. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    788.

      789. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    789.

      793.

      800.

                  end
          
      801.

      805. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    805. 
            

            

            
          
      806. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    806. 
            

            

              # Existing member_action :close (used by "处理完成" button)
          
      807. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    807. 
            
              1
            

            

              member_action :close, method: :put do
          
      808. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    808. 
            

            

                begin
          
      809. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    809. 
            

            

                  resource.close_processing!
          
      810. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    810. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursement_path(resource), notice: "报销单已关闭 (处理完成)"
          
      811. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    811. 
            

            

                rescue StateMachines::InvalidTransition => e
          
      812. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    812. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursement_path(resource), alert: "操作失败: #{e.message}"
          
      813. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    813. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      814. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    814. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursement_path(resource), alert: "发生未知错误: #{e.message}"
          
      815. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    815. 
            

            

                end
          
      816. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    816. 
            

            

              end
          
      817. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    817. 
            

            

            
          
      818. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    818. 
            

            

              # ADDED: member_action :reopen_reimbursement
          
      819. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    819. 
            
              1
            

            

              member_action :reopen_reimbursement, method: :put do
          
      820. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    820. 
            

            

                begin
          
      821. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    821. 
            

            

                  resource.reopen_to_processing!
          
      822. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    822. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursement_path(resource), notice: "报销单已取消完成，状态恢复为处理中。"
          
      823. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    823. 
            

            

                rescue StateMachines::InvalidTransition => e
          
      824. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    824. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursement_path(resource), alert: "操作失败: #{e.message}"
          
      825. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    825. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      826. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    826. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursement_path(resource), alert: "发生未知错误: #{e.message}"
          
      827. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    827. 
            

            

                end
          
      828. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    828. 
            

            

              end
          
      829. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    829. 
            

            

            
          
      830. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    830. 
            

            

              # Manual Override Controls - 手动状态覆盖控制
          
      831. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    831. 
            
              1
            

            

              member_action :manual_set_pending, method: :put do
          
      832. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    832. 
            

            

                command = Commands::SetReimbursementStatusCommand.new(
          
      833. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    833. 
            

            

                  reimbursement_id: resource.id,
          
      834. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    834. 
            

            

                  status: 'pending',
          
      835. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    835. 
            

            

                  current_user: current_admin_user
          
      836. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    836. 
            

            

                )
          
      837. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    837. 
            

            

            
          
      838. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    838. 
            

            

                result = command.call
          
      839. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    839. 
            

            

            
          
      840. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    840. 
            

            

                if result.success?
          
      841. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    841. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursement_path(resource), notice: result.message
          
      842. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    842. 
            

            

                else
          
      843. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    843. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursement_path(resource), alert: result.message
          
      844. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    844. 
            

            

                end
          
      845. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    845. 
            

            

              end
          
      846. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    846. 
            

            

            
          
      847. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    847. 
            
              1
            

            

              member_action :manual_set_processing, method: :put do
          
      848. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    848. 
            

            

                command = Commands::SetReimbursementStatusCommand.new(
          
      849. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    849. 
            

            

                  reimbursement_id: resource.id,
          
      850.

      859.

      862. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    862. 
            

            

            
          
      863.

              1
            

            

              member_action :manual_set_closed, method: :put do
          
      864. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    864. 
            

            

                command = Commands::SetReimbursementStatusCommand.new(
          
      865. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    865. 
            

            

                  reimbursement_id: resource.id,
          
      866.

      867. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    867. 
            

            

                  current_user: current_admin_user
          
      868.

                )

                def find_collection

      29.

                  collection = collection.where(work_order_id: params[:communication_work_order_id]) if params[:communication_work_order_id]

    app/commands/assign_reimbursement_command.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    50 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 50 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            require_relative '../services/shared/command_result'
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            require_relative '../repositories/reimbursement_repository'
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            # Command for assigning a reimbursement to a user
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            # Encapsulates the business logic and validation for reimbursement assignment
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            module Commands
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              class AssignReimbursementCommand
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                include ActiveModel::Model
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                include ActiveModel::Attributes
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                attr_accessor :reimbursement_id, :assignee_id, :notes, :current_user
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                validates :reimbursement_id, :assignee_id, :current_user, presence: true
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                def initialize(reimbursement_id: nil, assignee_id: nil, notes: nil, current_user: nil)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  @reimbursement_id = reimbursement_id
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  @assignee_id = assignee_id
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  @notes = notes
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  @current_user = current_user
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                def call
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  return failure_result(errors.full_messages) unless valid?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  # Get the reimbursement
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  reimbursement = find_reimbursement
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  return failure_result(["Reimbursement not found"]) unless reimbursement
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # Get the assignee
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  assignee = find_assignee
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  return failure_result(["Assignee not found"]) unless assignee
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  # Perform the assignment
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  assignment = perform_assignment(reimbursement, assignee)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  if assignment
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    success_result(assignment)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  else
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    failure_result(["Assignment failed"])
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  failure_result(["Unexpected error: #{e.message}"])
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44.

                def new

                def create

                  if @communication_work_order.save

      32.

      34.

                    redirect_to admin_communication_work_order_path(@communication_work_order), notice: '沟通工单创建成功'
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  else
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    render :new
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  end

                def update

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            # Controller layer authorization protection for ActiveAdmin resources
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            # Provides unified permission checking and error handling for API security
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            

            module AuthorizationConcern
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            

              extend ActiveSupport::Concern
          
      7.

      8.

              1
            

            

              included do

    9.

                before_action :check_current_user
          
      10.

              3
            

            

                rescue_from StandardError, with: :handle_authorization_error

              end

                # Define permission checks for different actions

                #
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                # Usage:

    17. 
            

            

                #   protect_action :index, with: :ReimbursementPolicy, method: :can_index?
          
      18.

                #   protect_action :create, with: :ReimbursementPolicy, method: :can_create?

                #   protect_action :batch_action, with: :ReimbursementPolicy, method: :can_batch_assign?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                #   protect_action :member_action, action_name: :assign, with: :ReimbursementPolicy, method: :can_assign?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                #
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
              1
            

            

                def protect_action(action_type, options = {})
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
              28
            

            

                  case action_type
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  when :member_action
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
              10
            

            

                    protect_member_action(options[:action_name], options)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  when :batch_action
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
              5
            

            

                    protect_batch_action(options[:action_name] || action_type, options)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  when :collection_action
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
              3
            

            

                    protect_collection_action(options[:action_name] || action_type, options)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  else
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
              10
            

            

                    protect_standard_action(action_type, options)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35.

                def protect_member_action(action_name, options)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
              10
            

            

                  policy_class = options[:with]
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
              10
            

            

                  method_name = options[:method] || "can_#{action_name}?"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
              10
            

            

                  before_action only: [action_name] do
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    instance_eval(&member_action_permission_check(policy_class, method_name))
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46.

                  policy_class = options[:with]

                def protect_standard_action(action_name, options)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
              10
            

            

                  policy_class = options[:with]
          
      66.

                  method_name = options[:method] || "can_#{action_name}?"

              10

      68.
