                def member_action_permission_check(policy_class, method_name)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  lambda do
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    policy = policy_class.constantize.new(current_admin_user, resource)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    check_authorization(policy, method_name, member_action: params[:action])
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
              1
            

            

                def batch_action_permission_check(policy_class, method_name)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  lambda do
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    policy = policy_class.constantize.new(current_admin_user)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    check_authorization(policy, method_name, batch_action: params[:batch_action])
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88.

                def collection_action_permission_check(policy_class, method_name)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  lambda do
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    policy = policy_class.constantize.new(current_admin_user)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    check_authorization(policy, method_name, collection_action: params[:action])
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
              1
            

            

                def standard_action_permission_check(policy_class, method_name, resource_name)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  lambda do
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    target_resource = resource_name ? controller_name.classify.constantize : resource
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    policy = policy_class.constantize.new(current_admin_user, target_resource)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    check_authorization(policy, method_name, standard_action: action_name)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              # Ensure user is authenticated
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
              1
            

            

              def check_current_user
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                unless current_admin_user.present?
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  handle_authentication_error
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              # Core authorization check method
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
              1
            

            

              def check_authorization(policy, permission_method, options = {})
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                # Check if user exists
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                unless current_admin_user.present?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  log_authorization_failure('User not authenticated', options)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  handle_authentication_error
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                # Check if policy method exists
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                unless policy.respond_to?(permission_method)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  log_authorization_failure("Permission method #{permission_method} not found", options)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  handle_authorization_error("权限检查配置错误", :internal_error)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                # Execute permission check
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                authorized = policy.send(permission_method)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                unless authorized
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  error_message = policy.respond_to?(:authorization_error_message) ?
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                                 policy.authorization_error_message(action: extract_action_from_options(options)) :
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                                 '您没有权限执行此操作'
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  log_authorization_failure(error_message, options)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  handle_authorization_error(error_message, options)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                # Log successful authorization
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                log_authorization_success(options)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                true
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              # Handle authentication errors
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
              1
            

            

              def handle_authentication_error
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  format.html {
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    flash[:alert] = '请先登录'
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    redirect_to new_admin_user_session_path
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  }
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  format.json {
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                      error: 'Authentication required',
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      message: '请先登录',
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      code: 401
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    }, status: :unauthorized
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  }
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              # Handle authorization errors
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              1
            

            

              def handle_authorization_error(message, options = {})
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  format.html {
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                    redirect_path = options[:redirect_to] ||
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                                   (respond_to?(:collection_path) ? collection_path : admin_dashboard_path)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    redirect_to redirect_path, alert: message
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  }
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  format.json {
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                      error: 'Authorization failed',
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                      message: message,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      code: 403,
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                      action: extract_action_from_options(options)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    }, status: :forbidden
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  }
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              # Handle unexpected errors
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
              1
            

            

              def handle_authorization_error(exception)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Authorization error: #{exception.class}: #{exception.message}"
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error exception.backtrace.join("\n") if Rails.env.development?
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  format.html {
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    flash[:alert] = '系统发生错误，请稍后重试'
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    redirect_to admin_dashboard_path
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  }
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  format.json {
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                      error: 'Internal server error',
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                      message: '系统发生错误，请稍后重试',
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                      code: 500
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  }
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

              end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

              # Extract action name for logging and error messages
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
              1
            

            

              def extract_action_from_options(options)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                options[:member_action] ||
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                options[:batch_action] ||
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                options[:collection_action] ||
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                options[:standard_action] ||
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                action_name
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

              end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              # Log successful authorization
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_authorization_success(options)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                return unless Rails.env.production? || Rails.env.staging?
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                action = extract_action_from_options(options)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                controller_name = self.class.name.gsub('Controller', '')
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[AUTH_SUCCESS] User: #{current_admin_user.email} | " \
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                                  "Controller: #{controller_name} | Action: #{action} | " \
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                                  "IP: #{request.remote_ip} | " \
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                                  "User-Agent: #{request.user_agent}"
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

              end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

              # Log authorization failure
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_authorization_failure(reason, options)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                action = extract_action_from_options(options)
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                controller_name = self.class.name.gsub('Controller', '')
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.warn "[AUTH_FAILURE] User: #{current_admin_user&.email || 'Unknown'} | " \
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                                  "Controller: #{controller_name} | Action: #{action} | " \
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                                  "Reason: #{reason} | " \
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                                  "IP: #{request.remote_ip} | " \
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                                  "User-Agent: #{request.user_agent}"
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                # Also log to security audit log
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                log_security_alert(action, reason)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

              end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

              # Log security alerts for audit purposes
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_security_alert(action, reason)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                security_log = {
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  timestamp: Time.current.iso8601,
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  event_type: 'authorization_failure',
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  user_id: current_admin_user&.id,
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  user_email: current_admin_user&.email,
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  user_role: current_admin_user&.role,
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  controller: controller_name,
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  action: action,
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  reason: reason,
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                  ip_address: request.remote_ip,
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  user_agent: request.user_agent,
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  request_params: sanitize_params_for_logging
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                }
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                # Write to separate security log file if configured
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[SECURITY_ALERT] #{security_log.to_json}"
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

              end
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

              # Sanitize sensitive parameters for logging
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
              1
            

            

              def sanitize_params_for_logging
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                return {} unless params.respond_to?(:to_unsafe_h)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                safe_params = params.to_unsafe_h.dup
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                sensitive_keys = %w[password password_confirmation current_password file file]
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                safe_params.each do |key, value|
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                  if sensitive_keys.include?(key.to_s)
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                    safe_params[key] = '[FILTERED]'
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                  elsif value.is_a?(Hash)
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                    value.each do |sub_key, sub_value|
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                      if sensitive_keys.include?(sub_key.to_s)
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                        safe_params[key][sub_key] = '[FILTERED]'
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                      end
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                    end
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                  end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                end
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

            
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                safe_params
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

              end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

              # Helper methods for common permission patterns
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
              1
            

            

              def require_super_admin!
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                unless current_admin_user&.super_admin?
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                  handle_authorization_error('此操作仅限超级管理员执行', { redirect_to: admin_dashboard_path })
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                end
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                true
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

              end
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
              1
            

            

              def require_admin_or_super_admin!
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                unless current_admin_user&.admin? || current_admin_user&.super_admin?
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                  handle_authorization_error('此操作仅限管理员执行', { redirect_to: admin_dashboard_path })
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                end
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                true
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

              end
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

            
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
              1
            

            

              def require_permission?(policy_class, method_name, resource = nil)
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                policy = policy_class.constantize.new(current_admin_user, resource)
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                policy.send(method_name)
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

              end
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

            
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

              # Double permission check for sensitive operations
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
              1
            

            

              def verify_sensitive_operation(policy_class, resource, operation)
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                return false unless check_current_user
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

            
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                # First permission check
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                primary_method = "can_#{operation}?"
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                return false unless require_permission?(policy_class, primary_method, resource)
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

            
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                # Secondary verification for most sensitive operations
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                sensitive_operations = %w[destroy delete batch_delete restore change_role]
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                if sensitive_operations.include?(operation.to_s)
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                  log_sensitive_operation_attempt(operation, resource)
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                end
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

            
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                true
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

              end
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

            
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

              # Log attempts at sensitive operations
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_sensitive_operation_attempt(operation, resource)
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.warn "[SENSITIVE_OPERATION] User: #{current_admin_user.email} | " \
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                                  "Operation: #{operation} | " \
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                                  "Resource: #{resource.class.name}##{resource.try(:id)} | " \
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                                  "IP: #{request.remote_ip} | " \
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                                  "Timestamp: #{Time.current.iso8601}"
          
      329.

              # Handle permission denied errors with user-friendly messages
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              def handle_permission_denied(exception)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # Determine if this is an ActiveAdmin request
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                if request.path.start_with?('/admin')
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  handle_activeadmin_permission_denied(exception)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                else
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  handle_api_permission_denied(exception)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26.

              # Handle permission denied in ActiveAdmin context
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              def handle_activeadmin_permission_denied(exception)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # Try to determine the action from the request
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                action = determine_action_from_request
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                resource_type = determine_resource_type_from_request
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Generate user-friendly message
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                message = generate_permission_message(action, resource_type)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # Store message in flash for display
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                flash[:alert] = message
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                flash[:permission_denied] = true
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Redirect to appropriate location

              # Handle permission denied in API context

              def handle_api_permission_denied(exception)

    45. 
            

            

                render json: {

    46. 
            

            

                  error: 'Permission Denied',

              # Determine the action from the current request

                when :get
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  if request.path.include?('/new')
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    :create
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  elsif request.path.include?('/edit')
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    :edit
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60.

      61.

      63.

                when :post
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64.

      66.

              # Determine resource type from request path

              def determine_resource_type_from_request
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                path_parts = request.path.split('/')
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                # Find the first part that looks like a resource name after /admin/
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                admin_index = path_parts.index('admin')
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                return '未知资源' unless admin_index
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                resource_part = path_parts[admin_index + 1]
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                return '未知资源' unless resource_part
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                # Convert English resource names to Chinese
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                case resource_part
          
      86.

                when 'reimbursements'

              # Generate user-friendly permission message
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              def generate_permission_message(action, resource_type)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                case action
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                when :view

    105. 
            

            

                  "您没有权限查看#{resource_type}，请联系超级管理员获取相应权限。"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                when :create
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  "您没有权限创建#{resource_type}，请联系超级管理员获取相应权限。"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                when :edit, :update
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  "您没有权限编辑#{resource_type}，请联系超级管理员获取相应权限。"
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                when :destroy
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111.

      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                when :assign
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113.

      116.

                else
          
      117.

      118.

              # Determine where to redirect after permission denied
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              def redirect_to_permission_denied_location
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                # If user is not logged in, redirect to login
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                unless current_admin_user
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  return redirect_to new_admin_user_session_path
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                # Try to redirect to a safe location based on user role
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                if current_admin_user.super_admin?
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  # Super admins can go to dashboard
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_dashboard_path
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                else
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  # Regular admins go to reimbursements (their main resource)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursements_path
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              # Check if user has permission and show appropriate UI
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              def verify_permission(policy_class, action, resource = nil)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                policy = policy_class.new(current_admin_user, resource)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                unless policy.send("can_#{action}?")
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  message = policy.authorization_error_message(action: action)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  raise CanCan::AccessDenied.new(message, action, resource ? resource.class : nil)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              # Render permission denied notice in ActiveAdmin views
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              def render_permission_denied_notice(action:, resource_type: nil, policy: nil)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                if policy
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  message = policy.authorization_error_message(action: action)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                else
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  message = generate_permission_message(action, resource_type)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                render partial: 'admin/shared/permission_denied', locals: {
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  message: message,
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  action: action,
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  resource_type: resource_type
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                }
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            end
          
      162.

    app/helpers/admin/work_order_operations_helper.rb

    15.79% lines covered

    19 relevant lines. 3 lines covered and 16 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # app/helpers/admin/work_order_operations_helper.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            

            module Admin
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            

              module WorkOrderOperationsHelper
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1
            

            

                def state_diff(previous_state, current_state)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  return nil if previous_state.blank? || current_state.blank?
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    prev_hash = JSON.parse(previous_state)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    curr_hash = JSON.parse(current_state)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    # Get all keys from both hashes
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    all_keys = (prev_hash.keys + curr_hash.keys).uniq
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    # Build HTML diff
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    html = '<div class="diff">'
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    all_keys.each do |key|
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      if !prev_hash.key?(key)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                        # Key only in current state (added)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                        html += "<div class='ins'>+ #{key}: #{curr_hash[key].inspect}</div>"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      elsif !curr_hash.key?(key)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                        # Key only in previous state (removed)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                        html += "<div class='del'>- #{key}: #{prev_hash[key].inspect}</div>"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      elsif prev_hash[key] != curr_hash[key]
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                        # Key in both but value changed
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                        html += "<div class='del'>- #{key}: #{prev_hash[key].inspect}</div>"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                        html += "<div class='ins'>+ #{key}: #{curr_hash[key].inspect}</div>"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    html += '</div>'
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    html.html_safe

                  rescue JSON::ParserError

              def permission_alert(action:, resource_type: nil)

                message = case action

              def permission_guard(user, policy, action, &block)

                if policy.send("can_#{action}?")

            class AdminUser < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Include default devise modules. Others available are:
          
      3.

              # :confirmable, :lockable, :timeoutable, :trackable and :omniauthable

              1
            

            

              devise :database_authenticatable, 
          
      5.

                     :recoverable, :rememberable, :validatable

              def sync_audit_result_with_status
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                case status
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                when 'approved'

    35.

    36. 
            

            

                when 'rejected'
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  self.audit_result = 'rejected'
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  self.audit_date = Time.current
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39.

      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.

    41. 
            

            

                # 避免触发无限循环
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                self.class.skip_callback(:save, :after, :sync_audit_result_with_status)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                save
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44.

            class CommunicationWorkOrder < WorkOrder

              def set_default_status
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                self.status = 'completed'  # Always set to completed, don't use ||= because state machine sets initial value

    37.

              def generate_filling_id
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                return if filling_id.present?  # Don't regenerate if already set
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                self.filling_id = FillingIdGenerator.generate(received_at)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            end

      237.

      238.

            class ImportPerformance < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              validates :operation_type, presence: true
          
      3.

              validates :elapsed_time, presence: true, numericality: { greater_than: 0 }

    4. 
            

            

              validates :record_count, presence: true, numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }

    5.

              # 计算每秒处理记录数
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              def records_per_second
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                return 0 if elapsed_time.zero? || record_count.zero?

                (record_count / elapsed_time).round(2)

              end

              # 解析优化设置

              def parsed_optimization_settings
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                return {} unless optimization_settings.present?
          
      24.

                JSON.parse(optimization_settings)

      28.

              # 性能等级评估
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              def performance_grade
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                rps = records_per_second
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                case rps
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                when 0..50
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  'C'
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                when 51..100
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  'B'
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                when 101..200

    38.

      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39.

              # 类方法：获取性能统计

              def self.performance_stats(operation_type = nil)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                scope = operation_type ? by_operation_type(operation_type) : all
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                {
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  total_imports: scope.count,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  avg_elapsed_time: scope.average(:elapsed_time)&.round(2) || 0,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  avg_records_per_second: scope.joins("").select("AVG(record_count / elapsed_time) as avg_rps").first&.avg_rps&.round(2) || 0,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  total_records: scope.sum(:record_count),
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  optimization_levels: scope.group(:optimization_level).count
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56.

            end

              def map_issue_code_errors_to_code
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                if errors[:issue_code].any?
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  errors[:code].concat(errors.delete(:issue_code))
          
      44.

                end
          
      45.

              def legacy_problem_code

    50. 
            

            

                # 通过 fee_type 关联获取 code，确保 fee_type 存在
          
      51.

                return nil unless fee_type
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                reimbursement = fee_type.reimbursement_type_code.to_s
          
      54.

                meeting = fee_type.meeting_type_code.to_s.rjust(2, '0')
          
      55.

    58. 
            

            

                result = "#{reimbursement}#{meeting}#{expense}#{issue}"
          
      59.

      60.

              def full_description

              def self.assigned_to_user(user_id)

              # 检查是否有未查看的操作历史

              def has_unviewed_operation_histories?
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                return true if last_viewed_operation_histories_at.nil?

                operation_histories.where('created_at > ?', last_viewed_operation_histories_at).exists?

              # === 新增：统一通知状态管理 ===
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              # 检查是否有任何更新（操作历史或快递工单）
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
              1
            

            

              def has_updates?
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                operation_histories.exists? || express_receipt_work_orders.exists?
          
      141.

              end
          
      142.
