      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              # 统一的通知状态检查方法
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              1
            

            

              def has_unread_updates?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                has_updates? && (last_viewed_at.nil? || (last_update_at && last_update_at > last_viewed_at))
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              # 计算最新更新时间
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
              1
            

            

              def calculate_last_update_time
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                times = []
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                # 获取最新的操作记录时间
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                latest_operation = operation_histories.maximum(:created_at)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                times << latest_operation if latest_operation
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                # 获取最新的快递收单时间
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                latest_express = express_receipt_work_orders.maximum(:created_at)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                times << latest_express if latest_express
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                # 返回最新的时间，如果没有则返回更新时间
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                times.max || updated_at
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              # 更新通知状态
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
              1
            

            

              def update_notification_status!
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                new_last_update_at = calculate_last_update_time
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                new_has_updates = (last_viewed_at.nil? || new_last_update_at > last_viewed_at)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                update_columns(
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  last_update_at: new_last_update_at,
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  has_updates: new_has_updates
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                )
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              # 标记为已查看（统一方法）
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              1
            

            

              def mark_as_viewed!
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                update!(
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  last_viewed_at: Time.current,
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  has_updates: false,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  # 保持向后兼容
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  last_viewed_operation_histories_at: Time.current,
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  last_viewed_express_receipts_at: Time.current
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                )
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              # 查询范围：有未查看操作历史的报销单
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :with_unviewed_operation_histories, -> {
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                where('last_viewed_operation_histories_at IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM operation_histories WHERE operation_histories.document_number = reimbursements.invoice_number AND operation_histories.created_at > reimbursements.last_viewed_operation_histories_at)')
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              }
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              # 查询范围：有未查看快递收单的报销单
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :with_unviewed_express_receipts, -> {
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                where('last_viewed_express_receipts_at IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM work_orders WHERE work_orders.reimbursement_id = reimbursements.id AND work_orders.type = ? AND work_orders.created_at > reimbursements.last_viewed_express_receipts_at)', 'ExpressReceiptWorkOrder')
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              }
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              # === 新增：查询范围 ===
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              # 有未读更新的报销单（替换原有的with_unviewed_records）
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :with_unread_updates, -> {
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                where(has_updates: true)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  .where('last_viewed_at IS NULL OR last_update_at > last_viewed_at')
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              }
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              # 分配给用户且有未读更新的报销单
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :assigned_with_unread_updates, ->(user_id) {
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                assigned_to_user(user_id).with_unread_updates
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

              }
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              # 按通知状态排序（有更新的优先，然后按最新更新时间倒序）
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :ordered_by_notification_status, -> {
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                order(
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  Arel.sql('has_updates DESC, last_update_at DESC NULLS LAST')
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                )
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              }
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

              # 查询范围：有任何未查看记录的报销单
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :with_unviewed_records, -> {
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                with_unviewed_operation_histories.or(with_unviewed_express_receipts)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

              }
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

              # ActiveAdmin configuration
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.ransackable_attributes(_auth_object = nil)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                %w[id invoice_number document_name applicant applicant_id company department
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                   receipt_status receipt_date submission_date amount is_electronic status
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                   external_status approval_date approver_name related_application_number
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                   accounting_date document_tags created_at updated_at current_assignee_id
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                   erp_current_approval_node erp_current_approver erp_flexible_field_2
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                   erp_node_entry_time erp_first_submitted_at erp_flexible_field_8]
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

              end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.ransackable_associations(_auth_object = nil)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                %w[fee_details work_orders audit_work_orders communication_work_orders
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                   express_receipt_work_orders operation_histories active_assignment current_assignee]
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              # 定义可用于Ransack搜索的scope
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.ransackable_scopes(_auth_object = nil)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                %w[with_unviewed_records with_unread_updates assigned_with_unread_updates]
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

              end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

              # Custom ransacker for current_assignee_id
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
              1
            

            

              ransacker :current_assignee_id do
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                Arel.sql('(SELECT assignee_id FROM reimbursement_assignments WHERE reimbursement_assignments.reimbursement_id = reimbursements.id AND reimbursement_assignments.is_active = true LIMIT 1)')
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

              end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

              # Instance methods
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

              # Check if this reimbursement is in pending status
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
              1
            

            

              def pending?
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                status == STATUS_PENDING
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

              end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

              # Check if this reimbursement is in processing status
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
              1
            

            

              def processing?
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                status == STATUS_PROCESSING
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

              end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

              # Check if this reimbursement is in closed status
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
              1
            

            

              def closed?
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                status == STATUS_CLOSED
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

              end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

            
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

              # Check if this reimbursement is electronic
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
              1
            

            

              def electronic?
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                !!is_electronic
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

              end
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

            
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

              # Check if all fee details are verified
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
              1
            

            

              def all_fee_details_verified?
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                fee_details.any? && fee_details.where.not(verification_status: FeeDetail::VERIFICATION_STATUS_VERIFIED).none?
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

              end
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

            
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

              # Check if any fee details are problematic
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
              1
            

            

              def any_fee_details_problematic?
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                fee_details.problematic.exists?
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

              end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

            
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

              # Check if this reimbursement can be closed
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
              1
            

            

              def can_be_closed?
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                processing? && all_fee_details_verified?
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

              end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

              # Close this reimbursement
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
              1
            

            

              def close!
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                if can_be_closed?
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                  mark_as_close! # Use state machine event
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                end
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                # If cannot be closed, do nothing (legacy behavior)
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

              end
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

              # Alternative close method with different naming convention for backward compatibility
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
              1
            

            

              def mark_as_close!
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                close_processing! # Use state machine event
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

              end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

            
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

              # Check if this reimbursement can be closed (alternative naming convention)
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
              1
            

            

              def can_mark_as_close?
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                can_be_closed?
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

              end
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

            
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

              # Check if this reimbursement is in closed status (handles both 'close' and 'closed')
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
              1
            

            

              def closed?
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                status == STATUS_CLOSED || status == STATUS_CLOSE_ALIAS
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

              end
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

            
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

              # Update the status based on fee details
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
              1
            

            

              def update_status_based_on_fee_details!
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
              66
            

            

                case status
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                when STATUS_PROCESSING
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                  close! if all_fee_details_verified?
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                when STATUS_CLOSED
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                  reopen_to_processing! if any_fee_details_problematic?
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                end
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
              66
            

            

                true
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

              end
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

            
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

              # Reopen a closed reimbursement to processing
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
              1
            

            

              def reopen_to_processing!
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                return false unless closed?
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                update(status: STATUS_PROCESSING)
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

              end
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

            
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

              # Manual status change with override protection
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
              1
            

            

              def manual_status_change!(new_status, user = nil)
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                update!(
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                  status: new_status,
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                  manual_override: true,
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                  manual_override_at: Time.current
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                )
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Manual status change by #{user&.email || 'system'}: #{invoice_number} -> #{new_status}"
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

              end
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

            
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

              # Reset manual override flag
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            
              1
            

            

              def reset_manual_override!
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                update!(
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                  manual_override: false,
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                  manual_override_at: nil
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

                )
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

              end
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

            
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

              # Check if external status should force closure
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            
              1
            

            

              def should_close_based_on_external_status?
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                return false unless external_status.present?
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                external_status.match?(/已付款|待付款/)
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

              end
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

            
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

              # Check if reimbursement has active work orders
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            
              1
            

            

              def has_active_work_orders?
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                audit_work_orders.exists? || communication_work_orders.exists?
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

              end
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

            
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

              # Determine internal status based on business rules
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            
              1
            

            

              def determine_internal_status_from_external(external_status_value)
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

                return status if manual_override?
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

            
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                case
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                when external_status_value&.match?(/已付款|待付款/)
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                  STATUS_CLOSED
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

                when has_active_work_orders?
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

                  STATUS_PROCESSING
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                else
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363.

              after_save :set_status_based_on_processing_opinion, if: -> { processing_opinion.present? && persisted? }
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              # 判断工单是否可编辑
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
              1
            

            

              def editable?
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                pending?
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              # 同步费用明细验证状态 - 简化版本
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
              1
            

            

              def sync_fee_details_verification_status
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrder#sync_fee_details_verification_status: 开始同步费用明细状态，工单 ##{id}, 当前状态: #{status}"
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                fee_detail_ids = fee_details.pluck(:id)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrder#sync_fee_details_verification_status: 关联的费用明细ID: #{fee_detail_ids.inspect}"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                if fee_detail_ids.any?
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug 'WorkOrder#sync_fee_details_verification_status: 调用 FeeDetailStatusService.update_status'
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  FeeDetailStatusService.new(fee_detail_ids).update_status
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug 'WorkOrder#sync_fee_details_verification_status: 费用明细状态更新完成'
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                else
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug 'WorkOrder#sync_fee_details_verification_status: 没有关联的费用明细，跳过更新'
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              # Update associated fee details status - backward compatibility method for tests
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
              1
            

            

              def update_associated_fee_details_status(new_status)

                fee_details.update_all(verification_status: new_status)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

              end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              # 处理提交的费用明细ID
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
              1
            

            

              def process_submitted_fee_details
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                submitted_ids = Array(@_direct_submitted_fee_ids).map(&:to_i).uniq
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                @_direct_submitted_fee_ids = nil
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                current_ids = work_order_fee_details.pluck(:fee_detail_id)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                ids_to_add = submitted_ids - current_ids
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                ids_to_remove = current_ids - submitted_ids
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                ids_to_add.each do |fee_detail_id|
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  work_order_fee_details.create(fee_detail_id: fee_detail_id)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                work_order_fee_details.where(fee_detail_id: ids_to_remove).destroy_all if ids_to_remove.any?
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                sync_fee_details_verification_status
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              # Process fee detail selections - backward compatibility method for tests
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
              1
            

            

              def process_fee_detail_selections
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                fee_detail_ids = Array(instance_variable_get('@fee_detail_ids_to_select')).map(&:to_i).uniq
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                remove_instance_variable('@fee_detail_ids_to_select') if instance_variable_defined?('@fee_detail_ids_to_select')
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                current_ids = work_order_fee_details.pluck(:fee_detail_id)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                ids_to_add = fee_detail_ids - current_ids
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                ids_to_remove = current_ids - fee_detail_ids
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                ids_to_add.each do |fee_detail_id|
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  work_order_fee_details.create(fee_detail_id: fee_detail_id)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                work_order_fee_details.where(fee_detail_id: ids_to_remove).destroy_all if ids_to_remove.any?
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                sync_fee_details_verification_status
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              # 处理问题类型ID
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
              1
            

            

              def process_problem_types
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                problem_ids = Array(@problem_type_ids).map(&:to_i).uniq
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                @problem_type_ids = nil
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                WorkOrderProblemService.new(self).add_problems(problem_ids)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              # 根据处理意见设置状态
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
              1
            

            

              def set_status_based_on_processing_opinion
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                return unless respond_to?(:processing_opinion)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                case processing_opinion
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                when '可以通过'
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  handle_status_transition(:approve, 'approved')
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                when '无法通过'
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  handle_status_transition(:reject, 'rejected')
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              # 记录状态变更
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_status_change(work_order, transition)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                WorkOrderOperation.create!(
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  work_order: work_order,
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  operation_type: WorkOrderOperation::OPERATION_TYPE_STATUS_CHANGE,
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  details: "状态变更: #{transition.from} -> #{transition.to}",
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  admin_user_id: Current.admin_user&.id
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                ) if defined?(WorkOrderOperation)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              # 处理状态转换
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
              1
            

            

              def handle_status_transition(action, status)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                send(action)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "WorkOrder ##{id}: 状态已更新为 #{status}"
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

              rescue StateMachines::InvalidTransition => e
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.warn "WorkOrder ##{id}: 无法更新为 #{status}，当前状态: #{status}, 错误: #{e.message}"
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

              end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

              # 记录创建操作
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_creation
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                admin_user_id = Current.admin_user&.id || created_by || 1
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                WorkOrderOperation.create!(
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  work_order: self,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  operation_type: WorkOrderOperation::OPERATION_TYPE_CREATE,
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  details: "创建#{self.class.name.underscore.humanize}",
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  admin_user_id: admin_user_id
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                ) if defined?(WorkOrderOperation)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

              end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

              # 记录更新操作
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_update
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                important_changes = saved_changes.except('updated_at', 'created_at')
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

            
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                return unless important_changes.any?
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                change_details = important_changes
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                                  .map { |attr, values| "#{attr}: #{values[0].inspect} -> #{values[1].inspect}" }
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                                  .join(', ')
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                WorkOrderOperation.create!(
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  work_order: self,
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  operation_type: WorkOrderOperation::OPERATION_TYPE_UPDATE,
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  details: "更新: #{change_details}",
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  admin_user_id: Current.admin_user&.id
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                ) if defined?(WorkOrderOperation)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

              end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

              # 根据工单类型更新报销单状态
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
              1
            

            

              def update_reimbursement_status_on_create
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                return unless is_a?(AuditWorkOrder) || is_a?(CommunicationWorkOrder)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                return unless reimbursement.pending?
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

            
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrder#update_reimbursement_status_on_create: 更新报销单 ##{reimbursement.id} 状态，从 #{reimbursement.status} 到 processing"
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

            
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                reimbursement.start_processing
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrder#update_reimbursement_status_on_create: 报销单状态更新后: #{reimbursement.status}"
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

              end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
              1
            

            

              def express_receipt_work_order?
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                type == 'ExpressReceiptWorkOrder'
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

              end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
              1
            

            

              def update_reimbursement_notification_status
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                return unless reimbursement
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                reimbursement.update_notification_status!
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

              end
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

            end

    app/models/work_order_fee_detail.rb

            # app/models/work_order_fee_detail.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class WorkOrderFeeDetail < ApplicationRecord
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              belongs_to :fee_detail
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              belongs_to :work_order
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # 校验确保唯一性
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              validates :fee_detail_id, uniqueness: { scope: :work_order_id, message: "已经与此工单关联" }
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              validates :fee_detail_id, presence: true
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              validates :work_order_id, presence: true
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              # Ransack 搜索权限
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def self.ransackable_attributes(auth_object = nil)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                ["created_at", "fee_detail_id", "id", "id_value", "updated_at", "work_order_id"]
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              def self.ransackable_associations(auth_object = nil)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                ["fee_detail", "work_order"]
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              # 添加按工单类型筛选的scope
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              scope :by_work_order_type, ->(type) { joins(:work_order).where(work_orders: { type: type }) }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              # 添加按费用明细ID筛选的scope
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              scope :by_fee_detail, ->(fee_detail_id) { where(fee_detail_id: fee_detail_id) }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              # 添加按工单ID筛选的scope
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              scope :by_work_order, ->(work_order_id) { where(work_order_id: work_order_id) }
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              # 回调：创建或更新关联后，更新费用明细的验证状态
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              after_commit :update_fee_detail_status, on: [:create, :update]
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              # 回调：删除关联后，更新费用明细的验证状态
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              after_commit :update_fee_detail_status, on: :destroy
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              private
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              # 更新费用明细的验证状态
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38.

              def update_fee_detail_status

            class WorkOrderStatusChange < ApplicationRecord

            class AdminUserPolicy

              # Index permissions - Only super admins can view admin users

              def can_index?
          
      15.

              def can_update_own_profile?

    87. 
            

            

                return false unless user_present?
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                return true if super_admin?
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                # Regular admin users can only update their own profile (except role and status)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                user&.id == admin_user&.id
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92.

              def role_display_name
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                case user&.role
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                when 'super_admin'
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  '超级管理员'
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                when 'admin'
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  '管理员'
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                else
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  '未知角色'
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137.

      138.

              # Permission error messages
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              def authorization_error_message(action:)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                case action
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                when :index, :show, :view
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限查看管理员用户列表，请联系超级管理员'
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                when :create, :update, :edit
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限创建或修改管理员用户，请联系超级管理员'
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                when :destroy, :soft_delete, :restore
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限删除或恢复管理员用户，请联系超级管理员'
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                when :batch_soft_delete, :batch_restore, :batch_set_active, :batch_set_inactive
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限执行批量操作，请联系超级管理员'
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                when :change_role, :change_status
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限修改用户角色或状态，请联系超级管理员'
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                when :update_own_profile
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  '您只能修改自己的个人信息，请联系超级管理员修改其他用户信息'
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                when :change_own_password
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  '您只能修改自己的密码，请联系超级管理员修改其他用户密码'
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                else
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限执行此操作，请联系超级管理员'
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              # Class methods for quick permission checks

              class << self

                def can_index?(user)

              private

              # Helper method to check if user exists

    187. 
            

            

              def user_present?

    188.

    189. 
            

            

              end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

              # Helper method to check super admin status
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              def super_admin?
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                user&.super_admin? || false
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              # Helper method to check if this is the current user's own profile
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              def own_profile?
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                user_present? && admin_user.present? && user.id == admin_user.id
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            end
          
      201.

            # Policy object for handling authorization logic related to FeeDetail resources
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            # Centralizes permission checks and provides clear business rules for access control
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            

            class FeeDetailPolicy
          
      6.

              def initialize(user, fee_detail = nil)

    9. 
            
              1
            

            

                @user = user

              # Index permissions - All authenticated users can view fee details

              # Update permissions - Only super admins can update fee details

              def can_update?

              # Role-based display names
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
              1
            

            

              def role_display_name
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                case user&.role
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                when 'super_admin'
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  '超级管理员'
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                when 'admin'
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  '管理员'
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                else
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  '未知角色'
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              # Permission error messages
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              1
            

            

              def authorization_error_message(action:)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                case action
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                when :create, :update, :edit
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限创建或修改费用明细，请联系超级管理员'
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                when :destroy
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限删除费用明细，请联系超级管理员'
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                when :upload_attachment
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限上传附件，请联系超级管理员'
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                when :batch_operations
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限执行批量操作，请联系超级管理员'
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                else
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限执行此操作，请联系超级管理员'
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111.

            # Policy object for handling authorization logic related to Reimbursement resources
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            # Centralizes permission checks and provides clear business rules for access control
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            class ReimbursementPolicy
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              attr_reader :user, :reimbursement
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def initialize(user, reimbursement = nil)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @user = user
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @reimbursement = reimbursement
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # Index permissions

              # Role-based display names
