              def role_display_name
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                case user&.role
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                when 'super_admin'
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  '超级管理员'
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                when 'admin'
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  '管理员'
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                else
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  '未知角色'
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185.

      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end

              # Permission error messages

    189. 
            

            

              def authorization_error_message(action:)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                case action
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                when :assign, :batch_assign, :transfer_assignment, :unassign
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限执行分配操作，请联系超级管理员'
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                when :manual_override, :set_pending, :set_processing, :set_closed, :reset_override
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限执行手动状态覆盖操作，请联系超级管理员'
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                when :destroy
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限删除报销单，请联系超级管理员'
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                when :upload_attachment
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限上传附件，请联系超级管理员'
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                when :import
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限导入数据，请联系超级管理员'
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                when :create, :update
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限执行此操作，请确保您已正确登录'
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                else
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  '您没有权限执行此操作，请联系超级管理员'
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                end
          
      206.

              end

            end

            # Repository for FeeDetail data access

      5.

              def self.find(id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              4
            

            

                FeeDetail.find(id)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              2

              def self.find_or_create_by_external_fee_id(external_fee_id, attributes = {})

    23. 
            
              1

              # Join operations

              def self.joins(associations)

    188.

              # Bulk operations

              def self.update_all(updates, conditions = nil)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                if conditions
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  where(conditions).update_all(updates)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                else
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  FeeDetail.update_all(updates)
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.delete_all(conditions = nil)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                if conditions
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  where(conditions).delete_all
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                else
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  FeeDetail.delete_all

              # Performance-optimized queries

              def self.select_fields(fields = [:id, :document_number, :fee_type, :amount, :verification_status, :fee_date])

              # Error handling wrapper
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.safe_find(id)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
              2
            

            

                find(id)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                nil
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error finding fee detail #{id}: #{e.message}"
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                nil
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

              end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.safe_find_by_external_fee_id(external_fee_id)
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
              2
            

            

                find_by_external_fee_id(external_fee_id)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error finding fee detail by external fee ID #{external_fee_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                nil
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

              end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

              # Complex queries for reporting
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.verification_summary
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
              1
            

            

                group(:verification_status)
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                  .select(:verification_status, 'COUNT(*) as count', 'SUM(amount) as total_amount')
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                  .order(:verification_status)
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

              end
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

            
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.monthly_totals(year = Date.current.year)
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                where('EXTRACT(YEAR FROM fee_date) = ?', year)
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  .group('EXTRACT(MONTH FROM fee_date)')
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  .select('EXTRACT(MONTH FROM fee_date) as month', 'SUM(amount) as total_amount', 'COUNT(*) as count')
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  .order(:month)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

              end
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

            
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
              1
            

            

              def self.by_fee_type_totals
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
              1
            

            

                group(:fee_type)
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  .select(:fee_type, 'SUM(amount) as total_amount', 'COUNT(*) as count', 'AVG(amount) as average_amount')
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  .order('SUM(amount) DESC')
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

              end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

            end
          
      283.

    app/repositories/reimbursement_repository.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    221 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 221 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            # Repository for Reimbursement data access
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            # Provides a clean interface for database operations and query logic
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            class ReimbursementRepository
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Find operations
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def self.find(id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.find(id)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                nil
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              def self.find_by_id(id)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.find_by(id: id)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              def self.find_by_invoice_number(invoice_number)

                Reimbursement.find_by(invoice_number: invoice_number)

    19. 
            

            

              end
          
      20.

      21.

              def self.find_or_initialize_by_invoice_number(invoice_number)

      24.

      25.

              # Batch operations
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              def self.find_by_ids(reimbursement_ids)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.where(id: reimbursement_ids)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              def self.find_each_by_ids(reimbursement_ids, &block)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.where(id: reimbursement_ids).find_each(&block)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              def self.find_by_invoice_numbers(invoice_numbers)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.where(invoice_number: invoice_numbers)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              def self.index_by_invoice_numbers(invoice_numbers)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.where(invoice_number: invoice_numbers).index_by(&:invoice_number)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              # Query operations

              def self.where_in(field, values)

              def self.distinct_pluck(field)

    88.

      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              def self.distinct_compact_sort_pluck(field)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.where.not(field => [nil, '']).distinct.pluck(field).compact.sort
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94.

              def self.where_count(conditions)

      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              # Date range queries
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              def self.created_between(start_date, end_date)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.where(created_at: start_date..end_date)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

              def self.created_today
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                created_between(Date.current.beginning_of_day, Date.current.end_of_day)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              # Status queries

              def self.by_status(status)

              end

                Reimbursement.where(status: statuses)

    119. 
            

            

              end
          
      120.

              def self.pending

                by_status('pending')

              end

              # Electronic/non-electronic queries
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              def self.electronic
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                where(is_electronic: true)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              def self.non_electronic
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                where(is_electronic: false)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              # Assignment queries
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              def self.my_assignments(user_id)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                assigned_to_user(user_id)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              # Update and notification queries
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              def self.with_unread_updates
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                where(has_updates: true)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  .where('last_viewed_at IS NULL OR last_update_at > last_viewed_at')
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

              end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

              def self.with_unviewed_operation_histories
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                where('last_viewed_operation_histories_at IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM operation_histories WHERE operation_histories.document_number = reimbursements.invoice_number AND operation_histories.created_at > reimbursements.last_viewed_operation_histories_at)')
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              def self.with_unviewed_express_receipts
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                where('last_viewed_express_receipts_at IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM work_orders WHERE work_orders.reimbursement_id = reimbursements.id AND work_orders.type = \'ExpressReceiptWorkOrder\' AND work_orders.created_at > COALESCE(reimbursements.last_viewed_express_receipts_at, reimbursements.created_at))')
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              def self.with_unviewed_records
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                with_unviewed_operation_histories.or(with_unviewed_express_receipts)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              def self.assigned_with_unread_updates(user_id)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                assigned_to_user(user_id).with_unread_updates
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              def self.ordered_by_notification_status
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                order(has_updates: :desc, last_update_at: :desc)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              # Complex queries
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              def self.with_active_assignment
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                joins(:active_assignment)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              def self.assigned_to_user(user_id)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                joins(:active_assignment).where(reimbursement_assignments: { assignee_id: user_id })
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              def self.with_unread_updates_for_user(user_id)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                # This would need to be implemented based on the actual business logic
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                # for what constitutes "unread updates"
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                where(has_updates: true)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              # ERP-related queries
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              def self.with_current_approval_node
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                where.not(erp_current_approval_node: [nil, ''])
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              def self.with_current_approver
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                where.not(erp_current_approver: [nil, ''])
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              def self.current_approval_nodes
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                with_current_approval_node.distinct_compact_sort_pluck(:erp_current_approval_node)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              def self.current_approvers
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                with_current_approver.distinct_compact_sort_pluck(:erp_current_approver)
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

              # Statistics queries
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              def self.status_counts
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                {
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  pending: pending.count,
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  processing: processing.count,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  waiting_completion: waiting_completion.count,
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  closed: closed.count
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                }
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

              end
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

              # Search and filtering
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

              def self.search_by_invoice_number(pattern)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.where('invoice_number LIKE ?', "%#{pattern}%")
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

              end
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

            
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

              def self.search_by_erp_field(pattern)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.where('erp_flexible_field_1 LIKE ? OR erp_flexible_field_2 LIKE ?', "%#{pattern}%", "%#{pattern}%")
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

              end
          
      227.

              # Pagination support

              def self.page(page_number, per_page = 25)

                limit(per_page).offset((page_number - 1) * per_page)

              def self.update_all(updates, conditions = nil)

    248. 
            

            

                if conditions

                  where(conditions).update_all(updates)

              def self.unassigned

              def self.for_user_dashboard(user_id)
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                assigned = assigned_to_user(user_id)
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                unread = with_unread_updates_for_user(user_id)
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

            
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                # Combine the queries
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                from("(#{assigned.to_sql} UNION #{unread.to_sql}) AS reimbursements")
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

              end
          
      289.

            class AttachmentUploadService
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              attr_reader :reimbursement, :params
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def initialize(reimbursement, params)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @reimbursement = reimbursement
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @params = params
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def upload
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                begin
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  fee_detail = build_fee_detail
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  fee_detail.attachments.attach(params[:attachments]) if params[:attachments].present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  if fee_detail.save
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    { success: true, fee_detail: fee_detail }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  else
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ') }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              private
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              def build_fee_detail
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                FeeDetail.new(
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  document_number: reimbursement.invoice_number,
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  external_fee_id: generate_external_fee_id,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  fee_type: 'ATTACHMENT_EVIDENCE',
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  amount: 0.00,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  verification_status: 'pending',
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  notes: params[:notes]
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                )
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              def generate_external_fee_id
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                "ATTACHMENT_#{reimbursement.invoice_number}_#{Time.current.strftime('%Y%m%d%H%M%S')}_#{SecureRandom.hex(3).upcase}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            end

            class AuditWorkOrderService < WorkOrderService
          
      5.

              def initialize(audit_work_order, current_admin_user)

                super(audit_work_order, current_admin_user)

                @audit_work_order = audit_work_order

              # The generic WorkOrderService#approve and WorkOrderService#reject methods
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              # will now be used, which call the state machine events.
          
      12.

              # Specific logic for AuditWorkOrder, if any beyond attribute assignment 
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # (handled by assign_shared_attributes in parent), can be added here or by overriding.
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              # The update method from WorkOrderService is now more generic.
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              # If AuditWorkOrder needs specific update logic beyond what WorkOrderService#update provides
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              # (which is assign_shared_attributes + save), it can be overridden here.
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # For now, let's assume the parent's update is sufficient after removing opinion-based status changes.
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              # We remove the specific `update` method from AuditWorkOrderService if its primary role
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              # was to set resolution/status based on processing_opinion, as this is now handled by explicit event calls
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              # in the parent service for approve/reject, and the parent update is now generic.
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              # However, if it had other specific logic, that should be preserved or re-evaluated.
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              # Based on the previous content, its main unique logic was setting :resolution and validating based on opinion.
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              # Let's simplify and assume for now that specific validations related to 'rejected' state
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              # (e.g., problem_type_id) are handled by model validations or can be added to WorkOrderService#reject if generic enough.
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              # The `processing_opinion` itself is still a valid attribute that can be set via params.
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              # REMOVED process_work_order method as status changes are driven by events.
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              # private
          
      32.

              #

              # def process_work_order

              #   case @audit_work_order.processing_opinion # @work_order can be used from parent

              #   when "可以通过"

              #     # @work_order.update(status: :completed)

            class CommunicationWorkOrderService < WorkOrderService

              # 重写 update 方法，添加更多日志
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              def update(params = {})
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "CommunicationWorkOrderService#update: 开始更新工单 ##{@work_order.id}, 当前状态: #{@work_order.status}"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "CommunicationWorkOrderService#update: 参数: #{params.inspect}"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                # 调用父类方法
          
      25.

                result = super(params)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "CommunicationWorkOrderService#update: 更新结果: #{result}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "CommunicationWorkOrderService#update: 更新后工单状态: #{@work_order.status}"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "CommunicationWorkOrderService#update: 更新后错误信息: #{@work_order.errors.full_messages.inspect}" unless result
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                result
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            end
          
      34.

    app/services/express_receipt_import_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    216 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 216 lines missed.
