            class FeeDetailImportService
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def initialize(file, current_admin_user)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @file = file
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @current_admin_user = current_admin_user
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @created_count = 0 # Changed from imported_count
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @updated_count = 0 # Added for clarity
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @skipped_due_to_error_count = 0 # Renamed from error_count for clarity on unprocessable rows
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                @errors = [] # Stores detailed error messages for rows that couldn't be processed
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @unmatched_reimbursement_count = 0 # Renamed from unmatched_details.count
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @unmatched_reimbursement_details = [] # Renamed from unmatched_details
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                Current.admin_user = current_admin_user # 设置 Current.admin_user 用于回调
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @optimization_manager = SqliteOptimizationManager.new(level: :moderate)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              def import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                return { success: false, errors: ["文件不存在"] } unless @file.present?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # 使用SQLite优化进行导入
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                @optimization_manager.during_import do
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  perform_import(test_spreadsheet)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              private
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              def perform_import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                begin
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  file_path = @file.respond_to?(:tempfile) ? @file.tempfile.to_path.to_s : @file.path
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  extension = File.extname(file_path).delete('.').downcase.to_sym
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  spreadsheet = test_spreadsheet || Roo::Spreadsheet.open(file_path, extension: extension)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  sheet = if spreadsheet.respond_to?(:sheet)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet.sheet(0)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                          else
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                          end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  headers = sheet.row(1).map { |h| h.to_s.strip }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  # Validate essential headers (费用id is optional for backward compatibility)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  expected_headers = ['报销单单号', '费用类型', '原始金额', '费用发生日期'] # Add other essential headers if any
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  missing_headers = expected_headers - headers
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  unless missing_headers.empty?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, errors: ["CSV文件缺少必要的列: #{missing_headers.join(', ')}"] }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  sheet.each_with_index do |row, idx|
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    next if idx == 0 # Skip header row
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    row_data = Hash[headers.zip(row)]
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    import_fee_detail(row_data, idx + 1)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  # Limit the amount of data returned to prevent session overflow
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # Store only counts and a limited number of error messages
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  error_summary = @errors.empty? ? [] : @errors.take(10)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  if @errors.size > 10
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    error_summary << "... and #{@errors.size - 10} more errors"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  {
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    success: @errors.empty?,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    created: @created_count,
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    updated: @updated_count,
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    unmatched_reimbursement: @unmatched_reimbursement_count,
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    skipped_errors: @skipped_due_to_error_count,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    error_details: error_summary,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    # Don't include the full unmatched_reimbursement_details array to save space
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    unmatched_count: @unmatched_reimbursement_details.size
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  }
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                rescue Roo::FileNotFound => e
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Fee Detail Import Failed: File not found - #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["导入文件未找到: #{e.message}"] }
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                rescue CSV::MalformedCSVError => e
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Fee Detail Import Failed: Malformed CSV - #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["CSV文件格式错误: #{e.message}"] }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Fee Detail Import Failed: #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["导入过程中发生未知错误: #{e.message}"] }
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              def import_fee_detail(row, row_number)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                external_id = row['费用id']&.to_s&.strip
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                document_number = row['报销单单号']&.to_s&.strip
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                fee_type = row['费用类型']&.to_s&.strip
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                amount_str = row['原始金额']
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                fee_date_str = row['费用发生日期']
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                # external_id is optional for backward compatibility
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                # Generate a unique ID if not provided
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                if external_id.blank?
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  external_id = "AUTO_#{document_number}_#{SecureRandom.hex(4)}"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                # 检查其他必要字段
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                unless document_number.present? && fee_type.present? && amount_str.present? && fee_date_str.present?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  @skipped_due_to_error_count += 1
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  @errors << "行 #{row_number}: 缺少必要字段 (报销单单号, 费用类型, 金额, 费用发生日期)"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  return
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                # 检查报销单是否存在
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                reimbursement = Reimbursement.find_by(invoice_number: document_number)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                unless reimbursement
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  @unmatched_reimbursement_count += 1
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  @unmatched_reimbursement_details << { row: row_number, external_fee_id: external_id, document_number: document_number, error: "关联的报销单不存在" }
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  return
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                # 简化重复检测逻辑：仅使用 external_fee_id 作为唯一标识符
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                existing_fee_detail = FeeDetail.find_by(external_fee_id: external_id)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                # 检查现有费用明细是否具有不同的document_number
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                if existing_fee_detail && existing_fee_detail.document_number != document_number
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  @skipped_due_to_error_count += 1
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  @errors << "行 #{row_number} (费用ID: #{external_id}): 关联的报销单号不匹配 - 现有: #{existing_fee_detail.document_number}, 导入: #{document_number}"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  return
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                # 如果找到现有记录，则更新；否则创建新记录
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                fee_detail = existing_fee_detail || FeeDetail.new(external_fee_id: external_id)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                is_new_record = fee_detail.new_record?
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                attributes = {
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  document_number: document_number,
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  fee_type: fee_type,
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  amount: parse_decimal(amount_str),
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  fee_date: parse_date(fee_date_str),
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  verification_status: fee_detail.verification_status || FeeDetail::VERIFICATION_STATUS_PENDING, # 保留现有状态，否则默认
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  month_belonging: row['所属月']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  first_submission_date: parse_datetime(row['首次提交日期']&.to_s&.strip),
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  # 新字段
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  plan_or_pre_application: row['计划/预申请']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  product: row['产品']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  flex_field_11: row['弹性字段11']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  flex_field_6: row['弹性字段6(报销单)']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  flex_field_7: row['弹性字段7(报销单)']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  expense_corresponding_plan: row['费用对应计划']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  expense_associated_application: row['费用关联申请单']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                }
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                fee_detail.assign_attributes(attributes)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                if fee_detail.save
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  if is_new_record
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    @created_count += 1
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "创建新费用明细: external_fee_id=#{external_id}, document_number=#{document_number}"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  else
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    @updated_count += 1
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "更新现有费用明细: external_fee_id=#{external_id}, document_number=#{document_number}"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  # 更新报销单状态，确保与费用明细状态保持一致
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  reimbursement.update_status_based_on_fee_details!
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  # 如果我们更改了document_number，则更新旧报销单的状态
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  if existing_fee_detail && existing_fee_detail.document_number != document_number && defined?(old_reimbursement) && old_reimbursement
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    # 更新旧报销单的状态，因为费用明细已被移除
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    old_reimbursement.update_status_based_on_fee_details!
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                else
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  @skipped_due_to_error_count += 1
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  @errors << "行 #{row_number} (费用ID: #{external_id}): 保存失败 - #{fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "保存费用明细失败: external_fee_id=#{external_id}, errors=#{fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

              def parse_date(date_string)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                return nil unless date_string.present?
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                begin
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  date_string.is_a?(Date) || date_string.is_a?(DateTime) ? date_string.to_date : Date.parse(date_string.to_s)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              def parse_datetime(datetime_string)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                return nil unless datetime_string.present?
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                begin
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  datetime_string.is_a?(Date) || datetime_string.is_a?(DateTime) ? datetime_string : DateTime.parse(datetime_string.to_s)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              def parse_decimal(decimal_string)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                return 0 unless decimal_string.present?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                begin
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  value = BigDecimal(decimal_string.to_s.gsub(',', '')) # 处理可能的逗号
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  # If parsing succeeds but results in 0 or negative, return 0
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  value.positive? ? value : 0
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  0 # Return 0 instead of nil for invalid values
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            end
          
      199.

    app/services/fee_detail_status_service.rb

    60 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 60 lines missed.

            # app/services/fee_detail_status_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class FeeDetailStatusService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def initialize(fee_detail_ids = nil)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                @fee_detail_ids = Array(fee_detail_ids)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              end
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # Update status for specific fee details
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def update_status
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                fee_details = @fee_detail_ids.present? ? 
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  FeeDetail.where(id: @fee_detail_ids) : 
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  FeeDetail.all
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                fee_details.find_each do |fee_detail|
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  update_fee_detail_status(fee_detail)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # Update status for fee details related to a specific work order
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              def update_status_for_work_order(work_order)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # Get all fee details associated with this work order - 简化版本
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                fee_detail_ids = work_order.work_order_fee_details.pluck(:fee_detail_id)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # Update their status
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                FeeDetail.where(id: fee_detail_ids).find_each do |fee_detail|
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  update_fee_detail_status(fee_detail)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              private
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              def update_fee_detail_status(fee_detail)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # 添加调试日志
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status: 开始更新费用明细 ##{fee_detail.id}, 当前状态: #{fee_detail.verification_status}"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # Get the latest work order associated with this fee detail
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                latest_work_order = get_latest_work_order(fee_detail)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                if latest_work_order.nil?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status: 没有关联的工单，保持或设置为 pending"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  # If no work orders, keep or set to pending
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  unless fee_detail.verification_status == "pending"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    fee_detail.update(verification_status: "pending")
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status: 更新状态为 pending"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  return
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status: 最新关联工单 ##{latest_work_order.id}, 类型: #{latest_work_order.type}, 状态: #{latest_work_order.status}"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Apply the "latest work order decides" principle
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                new_status = determine_status_from_work_order(latest_work_order)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status: 根据工单状态确定的新状态: #{new_status}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                # Update only if status has changed
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                if fee_detail.verification_status != new_status
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status: 状态需要更新，从 #{fee_detail.verification_status} 到 #{new_status}"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  result = fee_detail.update(verification_status: new_status)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status: 更新结果: #{result}, 错误: #{fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                else
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status: 状态未变更，保持为 #{fee_detail.verification_status}"
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              def get_latest_work_order(fee_detail)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                # 排除沟通工单，只考虑审核工单来决定状态
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                fee_detail.work_orders
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                           .where.not(type: 'CommunicationWorkOrder')
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                           .order(updated_at: :desc)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                           .first
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              def determine_status_from_work_order(work_order)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                # Skip express receipt work orders as they don't affect verification status
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                return "pending" if work_order.is_a?(ExpressReceiptWorkOrder)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # Skip communication work orders as they don't affect verification status
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                return "pending" if work_order.is_a?(CommunicationWorkOrder)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                case work_order.status
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                when "approved"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  "verified"
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                when "rejected"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  "problematic"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                else
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  # For pending or other statuses, keep as pending
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  "pending"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            end
          
      90.

    app/services/fee_detail_verification_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    59 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 59 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # app/services/fee_detail_verification_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class FeeDetailVerificationService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def initialize(current_admin_user)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                @current_admin_user = current_admin_user
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                Current.admin_user = current_admin_user # 设置 Current 上下文
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              end
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              # 更新单个费用明细的验证状态
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def update_verification_status(fee_detail, status, comment = nil)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Updating FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id} to status: #{status}"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # 确保 status 是模型中定义的常量之一
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                normalized_status = normalize_status(status)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                unless normalized_status
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  fee_detail.errors.add(:verification_status, "无效的验证状态: #{status}")
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Invalid verification status: #{status} for FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id}"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                if fee_detail.reimbursement&.closed?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  fee_detail.errors.add(:base, "报销单已关闭，无法更新费用明细验证状态")
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Reimbursement closed for FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id}. Cannot update status."
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Normalized status to: #{normalized_status} for FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id}"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                update_params = { verification_status: normalized_status }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                update_params[:notes] = comment if comment.present? # 只有当 comment 非空时才更新 notes
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                result = fee_detail.update(update_params)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                if result
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Successfully updated FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id}."
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  # 触发报销单状态更新检查 (这个回调在 FeeDetail 模型中定义，并且会在 verification_status 变化时触发)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  # 这里显式调用是为了确保在 Service 层操作后，如果模型回调没有覆盖所有场景或被跳过，状态也能更新。
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  # 不过，FeeDetail 的 after_commit :update_reimbursement_status 应该已经处理了。
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  # 可以考虑是否冗余，但保留它通常是安全的，除非有性能问题。
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  if fee_detail.reimbursement&.persisted? # Ensure reimbursement exists and is persisted
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                     fee_detail.reimbursement.reload.update_status_based_on_fee_details!
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                     Rails.logger.info "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Triggered reimbursement status update for Reimbursement ##{fee_detail.reimbursement.id}."
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                else
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Failed to update FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id}: #{fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                result
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              # 批量更新费用明细验证状态
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              def batch_update_verification_status(fee_details, status, comment = nil)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                normalized_status = normalize_status(status)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                unless normalized_status
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Batch update called with invalid status: #{status}"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    return false # 或者抛出参数错误
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # 如果 fee_details 是一个 ActiveRecord::Relation, to_a 不是必须的，但如果它是数组则无害
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                return true if fee_details.to_a.empty? # 如果没有费用明细需要处理，则认为操作成功
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                all_succeeded = true
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  fee_details.each do |fee_detail|
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    unless update_verification_status(fee_detail, normalized_status, comment)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      all_succeeded = false
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      raise ActiveRecord::Rollback # 如果有任何一个更新失败，回滚整个事务
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                all_succeeded
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              private
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              def normalize_status(status_param)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                # 将传入的 status (可能是字符串或符号) 标准化为模型中定义的常量
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # FeeDetail::VERIFICATION_STATUSES 已经是 [PENDING, PROBLEMATIC, VERIFIED]
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                status_string = status_param.to_s.downcase # 转为小写字符串以匹配常量值
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                return status_string if FeeDetail::VERIFICATION_STATUSES.include?(status_string)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                # 为了兼容旧的传入方式，也检查一下是否直接等于常量（虽然常量本身就是字符串）
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                return status_param if FeeDetail::VERIFICATION_STATUSES.include?(status_param)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                nil # 如果无法匹配任何有效状态，返回 nil
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            end
          
      88.

    app/services/filling_id_generator.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    15 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 15 lines missed.

            # app/services/filling_id_generator.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class FillingIdGenerator
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def self.generate(received_at)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                time = received_at || Time.current
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                year_month = time.strftime('%Y%m')
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                sequence = next_sequence(year_month)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                "#{year_month}#{sequence.to_s.rjust(4, '0')}"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              private
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def self.next_sequence(year_month)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # 查询当月最大流水号并+1
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # 使用Arel来处理SQL注入问题
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                max_sequence = ExpressReceiptWorkOrder
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  .where("filling_id LIKE ?", "#{year_month}%")
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  .maximum(Arel.sql("CAST(SUBSTRING(filling_id, 7, 4) AS INTEGER)")) || 0
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                max_sequence + 1
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            end
          
      21.

            # 改进版快递收单导入服务，支持更好的错误提示和字段兼容性

            class ImprovedExpressReceiptImportService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              TRACKING_NUMBER_REGEX = /快递单号[：:]\s*(\w+)/i
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6.

              # 字段映射配置 - 支持多种字段名
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              FIELD_MAPPINGS = {
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                document_number: ['单据编号', '单号', '报销单号'],
          
      9.

                operation_notes: ['操作意见', '备注', '说明'],

                filling_id: ['Filling ID', '填充ID', '记录ID']

              }.freeze

              def initialize(file, current_admin_user)

                @file = file

    17. 
            

            

                @created_count = 0

                @skipped_count = 0

    19. 
            

            

                @error_count = 0

                @errors = []

                @unmatched_receipts = []

              def import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                return { success: false, errors: ["文件不存在"] } unless @file.present?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                return { success: false, errors: ["导入用户不存在"] } unless @current_admin_user
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                begin
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  file_path = if @file.respond_to?(:tempfile)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                               @file.tempfile.to_path.to_s
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                             else
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                               @file.path
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                             end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  extension = File.extname(file_path).downcase[1..-1]
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  unless %w[csv xls xlsx].include?(extension)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, errors: ["不支持的文件格式，请上传 CSV 或 Excel 文件"] }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  spreadsheet = test_spreadsheet || Roo::Spreadsheet.open(file_path, extension: extension.to_sym)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  sheet = if spreadsheet.respond_to?(:sheet)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet.sheet(0)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                          else
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                          end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  headers = sheet.row(1).map { |h| h.to_s.strip }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "导入文件头部字段: #{headers.inspect}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  # 预验证：检查必需字段是否存在
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  validation_result = validate_headers(headers)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  if validation_result[:has_errors]
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    return {
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                      errors: validation_result[:errors],
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      suggestions: validation_result[:suggestions]
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    }
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  # 建立字段映射
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  field_map = build_field_mapping(headers)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "字段映射结果: #{field_map.inspect}"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  # 处理数据行
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  sheet.each_with_index do |row, idx|
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    next if idx == 0
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    row_data = Hash[headers.zip(row)]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "处理第 #{idx + 1} 行: #{row_data.inspect}"
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    import_express_receipt_with_mapping(row_data, idx + 1, field_map)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  # 生成详细的结果报告
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  generate_import_result
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  
          
      78.

                rescue => e

      81.

                end

      83.
