              def perform_import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                begin
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  file_path = @file.respond_to?(:tempfile) ? @file.tempfile.to_path.to_s : @file.path
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  extension = File.extname(file_path).delete('.').downcase.to_sym
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  spreadsheet = test_spreadsheet || Roo::Spreadsheet.open(file_path, extension: extension)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Handle both Excel and CSV files
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  sheet = if spreadsheet.respond_to?(:sheet)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet.sheet(0)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                          else
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet # Directly use spreadsheet if it's a CSV
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                          end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  headers = sheet.row(1).map { |h| h.to_s.strip }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  sheet.each_with_index do |row, idx|
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    next if idx == 0
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    row_data = Hash[headers.zip(row)]
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    import_operation_history(row_data, idx + 1)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  {
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    success: true,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    imported: @imported_count,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    skipped: @skipped_count,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    updated_reimbursements: @updated_reimbursement_count,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    unmatched: @unmatched_histories.count,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    errors: @error_count,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    error_details: @errors,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    unmatched_histories: @unmatched_histories
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Operation History Import Failed: #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["导入过程中发生错误: #{e.message}"] }
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              def import_operation_history(row, row_number)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                document_number = row['单据编号']&.strip
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                operation_type = row['操作类型']&.strip
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                operation_time_str = row['操作日期']
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                operator = row['操作人']&.strip
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                notes = row['操作意见']&.strip
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Importing history for row #{row_number}: Doc: #{document_number}, Type: #{operation_type}, Time Str: #{operation_time_str}, Operator: #{operator}, Notes: #{notes}"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                unless document_number.present? && operation_type.present? && operation_time_str.present? && operator.present?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  @error_count += 1
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  @errors << "行 #{row_number}: 缺少必要字段 (单据编号, 操作类型, 操作日期, 操作人)"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Skipping row #{row_number} due to missing required fields."
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  return
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                # 查找报销单
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                reimbursement = Reimbursement.find_by(invoice_number: document_number)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                unless reimbursement
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  @unmatched_histories << { row: row_number, document_number: document_number, error: "报销单不存在" }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Skipping row #{row_number}: Reimbursement #{document_number} not found."
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  return
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                operation_time = parse_datetime(operation_time_str)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Parsed operation_time: #{operation_time}"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                # 重复检查 (Req 14)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                if operation_time
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Checking for duplicates for Doc: #{document_number}, Type: #{operation_type}, Operator: #{operator}"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  # Query for potential duplicates based on other attributes
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  potential_duplicates = OperationHistory.where(
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    document_number: document_number,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    operation_type: operation_type,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    operator: operator
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  )
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Found #{potential_duplicates.count} potential duplicates."
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  # Check if any potential duplicate has exactly the same operation_time
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  is_duplicate = potential_duplicates.any? do |existing_history|
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    result = existing_history.operation_time.present? && existing_history.operation_time == operation_time
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Checking duplicate: existing_time=#{existing_history.operation_time}, current_time=#{operation_time}, is_duplicate=#{result}"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    result # 精确匹配，不使用时间窗口
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  if is_duplicate
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    @skipped_count += 1
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    return # 跳过重复记录
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                # 创建操作历史
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                operation_history = OperationHistory.new(
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  document_number: document_number,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  operation_type: operation_type,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  operation_time: operation_time,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  operator: operator,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  notes: notes,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  form_type: row['表单类型'],
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  operation_node: row['操作节点']
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                )
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                if operation_history.save
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  @imported_count += 1
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  # 自动分配审核员：如果报销单没有分配人，且操作类型是加签，且操作人匹配到admin_user，则自动指派
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  assign_auditor_from_operation_history(operation_history, reimbursement)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  # Note: Removed automatic reopening of closed reimbursements
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  # Status changes should now be driven by external status priority system
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                else
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  @error_count += 1
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  @errors << "行 #{row_number} (单号: #{document_number}): #{operation_history.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to save operation history for row #{row_number}: #{operation_history.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              def parse_datetime(datetime_string)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                return nil unless datetime_string.present?
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                begin
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  datetime_string.is_a?(Date) || datetime_string.is_a?(DateTime) ? datetime_string : DateTime.parse(datetime_string.to_s).in_time_zone
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              def assign_auditor_from_operation_history(operation_history, reimbursement)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                # 检查报销单是否没有分配人
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                return if reimbursement.active_assignment.present?
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                # 检查操作类型是否为加签
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                return unless operation_history.operation_type == '加签'
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                # 检查操作人是否匹配到admin_user
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                operator = operation_history.operator
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                return unless operator.present?
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                auditor = AdminUser.find_by_name_substring(operator)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                if auditor
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  # 创建分配记录
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  assignment = ReimbursementAssignment.new(
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    reimbursement: reimbursement,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    assignee: auditor,
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    assigner: @current_admin_user,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                    is_active: true,
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    notes: "自动分配：操作历史中检测到加签操作和操作人匹配"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  )
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  if assignment.save
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "  自动分配成功：报销单 #{reimbursement.invoice_number} 通过操作历史分配给 #{auditor.name}"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  else
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "  自动分配失败：#{assignment.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                else
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "  未找到匹配的操作人：#{operator}"
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            end
          
      183.

    app/services/optimized_fee_detail_import_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    197 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 197 lines missed.

            # app/services/optimized_fee_detail_import_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class OptimizedFeeDetailImportService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def initialize(file, current_admin_user, skip_existing: false)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                @file = file
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                @current_admin_user = current_admin_user
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @skip_existing = skip_existing
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @batch_manager = BatchImportManager.new(FeeDetail, optimization_level: :moderate)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @results = {
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  success: false,
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  created: 0,
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  updated: 0,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  skipped: 0,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  errors: 0,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  error_details: [],
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  unmatched_reimbursement: 0,
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  performance_stats: {}
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                Current.admin_user = current_admin_user
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              def import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                return { success: false, errors: ["文件不存在"] } unless @file.present?
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                begin
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  # 1. 解析所有数据
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  all_rows_data = parse_all_rows(test_spreadsheet)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, errors: ["没有有效数据"] } if all_rows_data.empty?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  # 2. 预加载关联数据
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  preload_associations(all_rows_data)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # 3. 数据验证和预处理
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  validated_data = validate_and_preprocess_data(all_rows_data)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  # 4. 批量处理（禁用回调以提升性能）
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  disabled_callbacks = [
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    [:save, :after, :update_reimbursement_status]
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  @batch_manager.batch_import_with_disabled_callbacks(validated_data, disabled_callbacks) do |batch|
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    process_fee_detail_batch(batch)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  # 5. 批量更新报销单状态
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  batch_update_reimbursement_statuses(validated_data)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  # 6. 收集性能统计
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  @results[:performance_stats] = @batch_manager.performance_stats
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  @results[:success] = @results[:errors] == 0
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Optimized fee detail import completed: #{@results}"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  @results
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                rescue Roo::FileNotFound => e
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Optimized Fee Detail Import Failed: File not found - #{e.message}"
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["导入文件未找到: #{e.message}"] }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                rescue CSV::MalformedCSVError => e
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Optimized Fee Detail Import Failed: Malformed CSV - #{e.message}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["CSV文件格式错误: #{e.message}"] }
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Optimized Fee Detail Import Failed: #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["导入过程中发生错误: #{e.message}"] }
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              private
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              def parse_all_rows(test_spreadsheet)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                file_path = @file.respond_to?(:tempfile) ? @file.tempfile.to_path.to_s : @file.path
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                extension = File.extname(file_path).delete('.').downcase.to_sym
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                spreadsheet = test_spreadsheet || Roo::Spreadsheet.open(file_path, extension: extension)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                sheet = spreadsheet.respond_to?(:sheet) ? spreadsheet.sheet(0) : spreadsheet
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                headers = sheet.row(1).map { |h| h.to_s.strip }
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # 验证必要的列
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                expected_headers = ['报销单单号', '费用id', '费用类型', '原始金额', '费用发生日期']
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                missing_headers = expected_headers - headers
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                unless missing_headers.empty?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "缺少必要的列: #{missing_headers.join(', ')}"
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                # 解析所有行数据
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                rows_data = []
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                sheet.each_with_index do |row, idx|
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  next if idx == 0 # Skip header row
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  row_data = Hash[headers.zip(row)]
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  row_data[:row_number] = idx + 1
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  rows_data << row_data
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Parsed #{rows_data.size} fee detail rows from import file"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                rows_data
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              def preload_associations(all_rows_data)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                # 预加载所有需要的报销单和费用明细
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                document_numbers = all_rows_data.map { |row| row['报销单单号']&.strip }.compact.uniq
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                external_fee_ids = all_rows_data.map { |row| row['费用id']&.strip }.compact.uniq
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                fee_type_names = all_rows_data.map { |row| row['费用类型']&.strip }.compact.uniq
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Preloading associations: #{document_numbers.size} reimbursements, #{external_fee_ids.size} fee details, #{fee_type_names.size} fee types"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                @existing_reimbursements = Reimbursement.where(invoice_number: document_numbers).index_by(&:invoice_number)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                @existing_fee_details = @batch_manager.batch_find_existing(:external_fee_id, external_fee_ids)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                @fee_types_map = FeeType.where(name: fee_type_names).index_by(&:name)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Preloaded #{@existing_reimbursements.size} existing reimbursements, #{@existing_fee_details.size} existing fee details, #{@fee_types_map.size} fee types"
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              def validate_and_preprocess_data(all_rows_data)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                valid_data = []
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                all_rows_data.each do |row_data|
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  external_id = row_data['费用id']&.to_s&.strip
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  document_number = row_data['报销单单号']&.to_s&.strip
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  fee_type = row_data['费用类型']&.to_s&.strip
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  amount_str = row_data['原始金额']
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  fee_date_str = row_data['费用发生日期']
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  # 验证必要字段
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  if external_id.blank?
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    @results[:errors] += 1
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    @results[:error_details] << "行 #{row_data[:row_number]}: 缺少必要字段 (费用id)"
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    next
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  unless document_number.present? && fee_type.present? && amount_str.present? && fee_date_str.present?
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    @results[:errors] += 1
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    @results[:error_details] << "行 #{row_data[:row_number]}: 缺少必要字段 (报销单单号, 费用类型, 金额, 费用发生日期)"
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    next
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  # 验证报销单存在
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  unless @existing_reimbursements[document_number]
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    @results[:unmatched_reimbursement] += 1
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    @results[:error_details] << "行 #{row_data[:row_number]}: 关联的报销单不存在 (#{document_number})"
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    next
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  # 预处理数据
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  processed_data = {
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    external_fee_id: external_id,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    document_number: document_number,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    fee_type: fee_type,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    amount: parse_decimal(amount_str),
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    fee_date: parse_date(fee_date_str),
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    verification_status: FeeDetail::VERIFICATION_STATUS_PENDING,
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    month_belonging: row_data['所属月']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    first_submission_date: parse_datetime(row_data['首次提交日期']&.to_s&.strip),
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    plan_or_pre_application: row_data['计划/预申请']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    product: row_data['产品']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    flex_field_11: row_data['弹性字段11']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    flex_field_6: row_data['弹性字段6(报销单)']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    flex_field_7: row_data['弹性字段7(报销单)']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    expense_corresponding_plan: row_data['费用对应计划']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    expense_associated_application: row_data['费用关联申请单']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    # 元数据
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    row_number: row_data[:row_number]
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  }
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  # 动态填充个人日常报销单的 flex_field_7
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  reimbursement = @existing_reimbursements[document_number]
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  if reimbursement&.document_name&.include?('个人日常和差旅（含小沟会）报销单') && processed_data[:flex_field_7].blank?
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    fee_type_record = @fee_types_map[fee_type]
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    if fee_type_record
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      processed_data[:flex_field_7] = fee_type_record.meeting_name
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "Row #{row_data[:row_number]}: Patched flex_field_7 with '#{fee_type_record.meeting_name}' for document #{document_number}"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  valid_data << processed_data
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Validated #{valid_data.size} fee detail records, #{@results[:errors]} errors"
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                valid_data
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              def process_fee_detail_batch(batch)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                # 1. 分离新增、更新和跳过的数据
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                new_records = []
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                update_records = []
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                skipped_count = 0
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                batch.each do |data|
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  external_fee_id = data[:external_fee_id]
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  existing_record = @existing_fee_details[external_fee_id]
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  # 构建属性（移除元数据）
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  attributes = data.except(:row_number)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  if existing_record
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    if @skip_existing
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                      # 跳过已存在的记录
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                      skipped_count += 1
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    else
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                      # 更新记录：保留ID和创建时间，保留现有验证状态
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                      update_records << attributes.merge(
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                        id: existing_record.id,
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                        created_at: existing_record.created_at,
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                        verification_status: existing_record.verification_status || attributes[:verification_status]
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      )
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  else
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    # 新增记录
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    new_records << attributes
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                # 2. 批量执行数据库操作
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                created_count = @batch_manager.batch_insert(new_records)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                updated_count = @batch_manager.batch_update(update_records, unique_by: :id)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                @results[:created] += created_count
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                @results[:updated] += updated_count
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                @results[:skipped] += skipped_count
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Fee detail batch processed: #{created_count} created, #{updated_count} updated, #{skipped_count} skipped"
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

              end
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

              
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

              def batch_update_reimbursement_statuses(validated_data)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                # 批量更新相关报销单的状态
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting batch reimbursement status updates..."
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                document_numbers = validated_data.map { |data| data[:document_number] }.uniq
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                # 批量更新报销单状态
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                document_numbers.each do |document_number|
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  reimbursement = @existing_reimbursements[document_number]
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  reimbursement&.update_status_based_on_fee_details!
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Updated statuses for #{document_numbers.size} reimbursements"
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

              end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

              # 解析方法（保持与原始服务一致）
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

              def parse_date(date_string)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                return nil unless date_string.present?
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                begin
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  date_string.is_a?(Date) || date_string.is_a?(DateTime) ? date_string.to_date : Date.parse(date_string.to_s)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

              end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

              
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

              def parse_datetime(datetime_string)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                return nil unless datetime_string.present?
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                begin
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  datetime_string.is_a?(Date) || datetime_string.is_a?(DateTime) ? datetime_string : DateTime.parse(datetime_string.to_s)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

              end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

              
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

              def parse_decimal(decimal_string)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                return 0 unless decimal_string.present?
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                begin
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                  value = BigDecimal(decimal_string.to_s.gsub(',', ''))
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  value.positive? ? value : 0
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                  0
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

              end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

            end
          
      267.

    app/services/optimized_reimbursement_import_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    184 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 184 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # app/services/optimized_reimbursement_import_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class OptimizedReimbursementImportService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def initialize(file, current_admin_user)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                @file = file
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                @current_admin_user = current_admin_user
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @batch_manager = BatchImportManager.new(Reimbursement, optimization_level: :moderate)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @results = {
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  success: false,
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  created: 0,
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  updated: 0,
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  errors: 0,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  error_details: [],
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  performance_stats: {}
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              def import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                return { success: false, errors: ["文件不存在"] } unless @file.present?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                begin
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # 1. 解析所有数据
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  all_rows_data = parse_all_rows(test_spreadsheet)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, errors: ["没有有效数据"] } if all_rows_data.empty?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  # 2. 数据验证和预处理
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  validated_data = validate_and_preprocess_data(all_rows_data)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  # 3. 批量处理（禁用回调以提升性能）
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  disabled_callbacks = [
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    [:save, :after, :update_status_based_on_fee_details],
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    [:create, :after, :update_notification_status],
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    [:update, :after, :update_notification_status]
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  @batch_manager.batch_import_with_disabled_callbacks(validated_data, disabled_callbacks) do |batch|
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    process_reimbursement_batch(batch)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  # 4. 批量状态更新（在所有数据导入完成后）
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  batch_update_statuses(validated_data)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  # 5. 收集性能统计
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  @results[:performance_stats] = @batch_manager.performance_stats
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  @results[:success] = true
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Optimized reimbursement import completed: #{@results}"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  @results
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                rescue Roo::FileNotFound => e
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Optimized Reimbursement Import Failed: File not found - #{e.message}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["导入文件未找到: #{e.message}"] }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                rescue CSV::MalformedCSVError => e
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Optimized Reimbursement Import Failed: Malformed CSV - #{e.message}"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["CSV文件格式错误: #{e.message}"] }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Optimized Reimbursement Import Failed: #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["导入过程中发生错误: #{e.message}"] }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              # Make this method public for testing
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              def batch_update_statuses(validated_data)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                # 批量更新状态（在所有数据导入完成后执行）
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting batch status updates..."
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                invoice_numbers = validated_data.map { |data| data[:invoice_number] }.uniq
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                # 批量查询需要更新状态的报销单
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                reimbursements_to_update = Reimbursement.where(invoice_number: invoice_numbers)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                updated_count = 0
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                reimbursements_to_update.each do |reimbursement|
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  external_status = validated_data.find { |d| d[:invoice_number] == reimbursement.invoice_number }&.dig(:external_status)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  if external_status.present?
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    # 使用模型方法确定内部状态
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    new_status = reimbursement.determine_internal_status_from_external(external_status)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    # 只有状态发生变化或外部状态更新时才保存
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    if new_status != reimbursement.status || external_status != reimbursement.last_external_status
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      reimbursement.update!(
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                        external_status: external_status,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83.
