            class ReimbursementQueryService
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              def initialize(current_admin_user)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                @current_admin_user = current_admin_user
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              end
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # 获取分配给当前用户的报销单
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # @param params [Hash] 查询参数
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveRecord::Relation] 报销单查询结果
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def assigned_to_me(params = {})
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                query = Reimbursement.joins(:active_assignment)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                                    .where(reimbursement_assignments: { assignee_id: @current_admin_user.id })
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                apply_filters(query, params)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              # 获取所有报销单
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              # @param params [Hash] 查询参数
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveRecord::Relation] 报销单查询结果
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              def all_reimbursements(params = {})
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                query = Reimbursement.all
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                apply_filters(query, params)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              # 获取未分配的报销单
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              # @param params [Hash] 查询参数
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveRecord::Relation] 报销单查询结果
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              def unassigned(params = {})
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                query = Reimbursement.left_joins(:active_assignment)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                                    .where(reimbursement_assignments: { id: nil })
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                apply_filters(query, params)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              # 获取分配给特定用户的报销单
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              # @param assignee_id [Integer] 被分配人ID
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              # @param params [Hash] 查询参数
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveRecord::Relation] 报销单查询结果
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              def assigned_to_user(assignee_id, params = {})
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                query = Reimbursement.joins(:active_assignment)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                                    .where(reimbursement_assignments: { assignee_id: assignee_id })
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                apply_filters(query, params)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              # 获取工作量统计
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] 工作量统计结果
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              def workload_statistics
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                stats = {}
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                # 获取所有管理员用户
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                admin_users = AdminUser.all
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                admin_users.each do |admin_user|
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  # 分配的报销单数量
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  assigned_count = ReimbursementAssignment.active.where(assignee_id: admin_user.id).count
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  # 已处理的报销单数量
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  processed_count = Reimbursement.joins(:active_assignment)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                                               .where(reimbursement_assignments: { assignee_id: admin_user.id })
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                                               .where(status: Reimbursement::STATUS_CLOSED)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                                               .count
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  # 待处理的报销单数量
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  pending_count = Reimbursement.joins(:active_assignment)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                                             .where(reimbursement_assignments: { assignee_id: admin_user.id })
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                                             .where.not(status: Reimbursement::STATUS_CLOSED)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                                             .count
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  stats[admin_user.id] = {
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    admin_user: admin_user,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    assigned_count: assigned_count,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    processed_count: processed_count,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    pending_count: pending_count,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    completion_rate: assigned_count > 0 ? (processed_count.to_f / assigned_count * 100).round(2) : 0
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  }
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                stats
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              private
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              # 应用过滤条件
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              # @param query [ActiveRecord::Relation] 初始查询
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              # @param params [Hash] 查询参数
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveRecord::Relation] 应用过滤条件后的查询
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              def apply_filters(query, params)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                # 状态过滤
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                if params[:status].present?
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  query = query.where(status: params[:status])
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                # 发票号过滤
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                if params[:invoice_number].present?
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  query = query.where('invoice_number LIKE ?', "%#{params[:invoice_number]}%")
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                # 申请人过滤
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                if params[:applicant].present?
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  query = query.where('applicant LIKE ?', "%#{params[:applicant]}%")
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                # 日期范围过滤
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                if params[:start_date].present? && params[:end_date].present?
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  query = query.where(created_at: params[:start_date]..params[:end_date])
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                # 金额范围过滤
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                if params[:min_amount].present? && params[:max_amount].present?
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  query = query.where(amount: params[:min_amount]..params[:max_amount])
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                elsif params[:min_amount].present?
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  query = query.where('amount >= ?', params[:min_amount])
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                elsif params[:max_amount].present?
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  query = query.where('amount <= ?', params[:max_amount])
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                # 排序
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                if params[:sort_by].present?
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  direction = params[:sort_direction] == 'desc' ? 'desc' : 'asc'
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  query = query.order("#{params[:sort_by]} #{direction}")
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                else
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  query = query.order(created_at: :desc)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                query
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            end
          
      129.

    app/services/reimbursement_scope_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    32 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 32 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class ReimbursementScopeService
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              attr_reader :current_user, :params
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def initialize(current_user, params = {})
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                @current_user = current_user
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @params = params || {}
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              # Apply scope filtering to an association chain
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # @param end_of_association_chain [ActiveRecord::Relation] The base relation to filter
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveRecord::Relation] The filtered relation
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def filtered_collection(end_of_association_chain)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                chain = end_of_association_chain
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # If viewing a single reimbursement (show action), don't apply any scope
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                # This ensures that even unassigned reimbursements can be viewed by ID
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                if params[:id].present?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  return chain
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # Get the current selected scope
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                current_scope = params[:scope]
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                # Apply appropriate filter based on the scope
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                case current_scope
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                when 'assigned_to_me'
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  # "分配给我的"scope - 显示分配给当前用户的报销单
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  chain.assigned_to_user(current_user.id)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                when 'with_unread_updates'
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # "有新通知"scope - 只显示分配给当前用户且有未读更新的报销单
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  chain.assigned_with_unread_updates(current_user.id)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                when 'pending', 'processing', 'closed'
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  # 状态相关的scope - 只显示分配给当前用户且状态匹配的报销单
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  chain.assigned_to_user(current_user.id).where(status: current_scope)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                when 'unassigned'
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  # "未分配的"scope - 显示未分配的报销单，所有角色都可以看到
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  chain.left_joins(:active_assignment).where(reimbursement_assignments: { id: nil }, status: 'pending')
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                when 'all', nil, ''
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  # "所有"scope或空参数 - 显示所有报销单
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  chain
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                else
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  # 其他scope - 默认显示所有报销单
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  chain
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              # Alias for filtered_collection to maintain compatibility
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              def scoped_collection(end_of_association_chain)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                filtered_collection(end_of_association_chain)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              private
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            end
          
      54.

    app/services/reimbursement_status_override_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    128 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 128 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # Service for handling manual status override operations for reimbursements
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            # Provides controlled methods to override reimbursement status with proper validation and audit trail
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            class ReimbursementStatusOverrideService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Result object for service operations
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              class Result
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                attr_reader :success, :message, :reimbursement, :errors
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                def initialize(success:, message:, reimbursement: nil, errors: [])
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  @success = success
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  @message = message
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  @reimbursement = reimbursement
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  @errors = errors
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                def success?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  @success
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                def failure?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  !@success
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              def initialize(current_user = nil)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                @current_user = current_user
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              # Manually set reimbursement status with override
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              # @param reimbursement [Reimbursement] The reimbursement to modify
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              # @param status [String] The new status to set
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              # @return [Result] Result object with success/failure information
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              def set_status(reimbursement, status)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # Validate inputs
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                result = validate_set_status_inputs(reimbursement, status)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                return result unless result.success?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                # Check if status is actually changing
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                if reimbursement.status == status
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  return Result.new(
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    message: "Status is already set to '#{status}'. No change needed.",
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    reimbursement: reimbursement
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  )
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                begin
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  # Store previous status for audit
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  previous_status = reimbursement.status
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  # Perform the manual status change (includes logging)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  reimbursement.manual_status_change!(status, @current_user)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  Result.new(
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    success: true,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    message: "Successfully updated reimbursement #{reimbursement.invoice_number} status from '#{previous_status}' to '#{status}' with manual override.",
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    reimbursement: reimbursement
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  )
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  Result.new(
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    message: "Failed to update status: #{e.message}",
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    reimbursement: reimbursement,
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    errors: e.record.errors.full_messages
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  )
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  Result.new(
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    message: "Unexpected error occurred: #{e.message}",
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    reimbursement: reimbursement,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    errors: [e.message]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  )
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              # Reset manual override for a reimbursement
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              # @param reimbursement [Reimbursement] The reimbursement to reset
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              # @return [Result] Result object with success/failure information
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              def reset_override(reimbursement)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                # Validate inputs
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                result = validate_reset_inputs(reimbursement)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                return result unless result.success?
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                # Check if there's actually an override to reset
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                unless reimbursement.manual_override?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  return Result.new(
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    message: "No manual override exists for reimbursement #{reimbursement.invoice_number}.",
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    reimbursement: reimbursement
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  )
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                begin
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  # Reset the manual override
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  reimbursement.reset_manual_override!
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  # Log the reset operation
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  log_override_reset(reimbursement)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  Result.new(
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    success: true,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    message: "Successfully reset manual override for reimbursement #{reimbursement.invoice_number}.",
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    reimbursement: reimbursement
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  )
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  Result.new(
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    message: "Failed to reset override: #{e.message}",
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    reimbursement: reimbursement,
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    errors: e.record.errors.full_messages
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  )
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  Result.new(
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    message: "Unexpected error occurred: #{e.message}",
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    reimbursement: reimbursement,
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    errors: [e.message]
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  )
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120.

              private

              attr_reader :current_user

              # Validate inputs for set_status operation
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              def validate_set_status_inputs(reimbursement, status)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                unless reimbursement.is_a?(Reimbursement)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  return Result.new(
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    message: "Invalid reimbursement object provided."
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  )
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                unless status.is_a?(String) && status.present?
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  return Result.new(
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    message: "Invalid status provided. Status must be a non-empty string."
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  )
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                unless Reimbursement::STATUSES.include?(status)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  return Result.new(
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    message: "Invalid status '#{status}'. Valid statuses are: #{Reimbursement::STATUSES.join(', ')}."
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  )
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                Result.new(success: true, message: "Inputs validated successfully.")
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              # Validate inputs for reset_override operation
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              def validate_reset_inputs(reimbursement)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                unless reimbursement.is_a?(Reimbursement)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  return Result.new(
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    success: false,
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    message: "Invalid reimbursement object provided."
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  )
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                Result.new(success: true, message: "Inputs validated successfully.")
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              # Log override reset operation
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              def log_override_reset(reimbursement)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                user_info = @current_user ? "by #{@current_user.email}" : "by system"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info(
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  "Manual override reset #{user_info}: " \
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  "Reimbursement #{reimbursement.invoice_number} " \
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  "at #{Time.current}"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                )
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174.

            # app/services/service_registry.rb

            class ServiceRegistry
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              class << self
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                # 获取服务实例
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def get_service(service_class, *args)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  # 确保服务类存在
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  unless service_class_exists?(service_class)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "未知的服务类: #{service_class}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  # 获取服务类常量
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  service_klass = service_class.is_a?(Class) ? service_class : service_class.to_s.constantize
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  # 实例化服务
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  instantiate_service(service_klass, *args)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # 根据服务名称获取服务实例
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                def get_service_by_name(service_name, *args)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  # 将服务名称转换为类名
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  service_class_name = service_name.to_s.camelize
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  # 如果名称不包含 "Service"，添加它
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  service_class_name += "Service" unless service_class_name.end_with?("Service")
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  # 获取服务实例
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  get_service(service_class_name, *args)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                # 获取工单处理服务
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                def get_work_order_service(work_order, current_admin_user = Current.admin_user)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # 根据工单类型获取对应的服务
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  service_class = case work_order
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                                  when AuditWorkOrder
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                                    AuditWorkOrderService
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                                  when CommunicationWorkOrder
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                                    CommunicationWorkOrderService
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                                  when ExpressReceiptWorkOrder
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                                    ExpressReceiptWorkOrderService
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                                  else
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                                    raise ArgumentError, "不支持的工单类型: #{work_order.class.name}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  # 实例化服务
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  instantiate_service(service_class, work_order, current_admin_user)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # 便捷方法：获取报销单导入服务

                private

                # 检查服务类是否存在
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                def service_class_exists?(service_class)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  return true if service_class.is_a?(Class)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    service_class.to_s.constantize
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    true
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  rescue NameError
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    false
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                # 实例化服务
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                def instantiate_service(service_klass, *args)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  # 如果第一个参数是工单，并且没有提供当前用户，使用 Current.admin_user
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  if args.first.is_a?(WorkOrder) && args.length == 1
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    service_klass.new(args.first, Current.admin_user)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  else
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    service_klass.new(*args)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            end
          
      108.

    app/services/shared/command_result.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    23 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 23 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            # Shared result object for command operations
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            # Provides consistent success/failure handling across all commands
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            module Shared
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              class CommandResult
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                attr_reader :success, :data, :errors, :message
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                def initialize(success:, data: nil, errors: [], message: nil)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  @success = success
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  @data = data
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  @errors = Array(errors)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  @message = message
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                def success?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  @success
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                def failure?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  !@success
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                def self.success(data: nil, message: nil)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  new(success: true, data: data, message: message)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                def self.failure(errors: [], message: nil)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  new(success: false, errors: errors, message: message)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            end
          
      33.

    app/services/simple_batch_reimbursement_import_service.rb
