                @work_order.errors.add(:base, "拒绝工单时发生错误: #{e.message}")
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "WorkOrderService Error: #{e.message} for work order #{@work_order.id}"
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                false
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

              end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              # General update method - now handles status changes based on processing_opinion
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

              def update(params = {})
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                # 添加调试日志
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 开始更新工单 ##{@work_order.id}, 当前状态: #{@work_order.status}"
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 参数: #{params.inspect}"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                # Ensure work_order is not completed before allowing updates
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                unless @work_order.editable?
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 工单不可编辑，当前状态: #{@work_order.status}"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  @work_order.errors.add(:base, "工单已完成，无法修改。")
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                # 保存更新前的属性
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                changed_attributes = {}
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                # 保存原始处理意见
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                original_processing_opinion = @work_order.processing_opinion
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 原始处理意见: #{original_processing_opinion.inspect}"
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                # 分配属性
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                assign_shared_attributes(params)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 分配属性后，处理意见: #{@work_order.processing_opinion.inspect}"
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 分配属性后，工单状态: #{@work_order.status}"
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                # 检查处理意见是否变更
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                processing_opinion_changed = @work_order.processing_opinion != original_processing_opinion
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 处理意见是否变更: #{processing_opinion_changed}"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                # 检查哪些属性发生了变化
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                @work_order.changed.each do |attr|
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  changed_attributes[attr] = @work_order.send("#{attr}_was")
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 变更的属性: #{changed_attributes.inspect}"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                # 如果处理意见变更为"可以通过"或"无法通过"，则调用相应的方法
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                if processing_opinion_changed
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 处理意见已变更，新处理意见: #{@work_order.processing_opinion}"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  case @work_order.processing_opinion
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  when '可以通过'
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 调用 approve 方法"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    return approve(params)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  when '无法通过'
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 调用 reject 方法"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    return reject(params)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 调用 save_work_order 方法"
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                if save_work_order("更新")
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  # 记录更新操作
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  @operation_service.record_update(changed_attributes) if changed_attributes.any?
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 更新成功"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  true
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                else
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#update: 更新失败，错误: #{@work_order.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  false
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              # Method to mark a work order as truly completed (sets the boolean flag)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              def mark_as_truly_completed
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                if @work_order.mark_as_truly_completed(@current_admin_user) # Call model method
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  true
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                else
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  # Errors will be on @work_order.errors from the model method
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  false
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

              # Update fee detail verification status (remains largely the same)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              def update_fee_detail_verification(fee_detail_id, verification_status, comment = nil)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                # Ensure work_order is not completed
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                unless @work_order.editable?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  @work_order.errors.add(:base, "工单已完成，无法修改费用明细验证状态。")
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                fee_detail = @work_order.fee_details.find_by(id: fee_detail_id)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                unless fee_detail
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  error_msg = "费用明细 ##{fee_detail_id} 未找到或未与此工单关联。"
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  @work_order.errors.add(:base, error_msg)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                end
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                # Assuming FeeDetailVerificationService is still relevant and handles its own logic
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                verification_service = FeeDetailVerificationService.new(@current_admin_user)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                result = verification_service.update_verification_status(fee_detail, verification_status, comment)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                unless result
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  fee_detail.errors.full_messages.each do |msg|
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                    @work_order.errors.add(:base, "费用明细 ##{fee_detail.id} 更新失败: #{msg}")
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                result
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                @work_order.errors.add(:base, "更新费用明细 ##{fee_detail_id} 验证状态时发生内部错误: #{e.message}")
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                false
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              private
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              def save_work_order(action_name = "保存")
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                begin
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  if @work_order.save
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                    true
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  else
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                    # Errors should already be on @work_order.errors from the save failure (including validation failures)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "WorkOrderService: 无法#{action_name}工单 ##{@work_order.id}. 错误: #{@work_order.errors.full_messages.join(", ")}"
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                    false
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                rescue StateMachines::InvalidTransition => e
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  # This exception occurs if a state transition fails due to validations within the state machine event.
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  # The errors should already be on @work_order.errors by the validation process.
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "WorkOrderService: State transition failed for ##{@work_order.id} during #{action_name}. Error: #{e.message}. Validation errors: #{@work_order.errors.full_messages.join(", ")}"
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  # Ensure errors from the exception message are also on the object if not already captured by validations (though they should be)
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  # Example: @work_order.errors.add(:base, e.message) unless @work_order.errors.full_messages.include?(e.message)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  false # Indicate failure
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

              end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

              
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

              # 处理费用明细选择
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

              def process_fee_detail_selections(fee_detail_ids)
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                return if fee_detail_ids.blank?
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                # 清除现有关联
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                @work_order.work_order_fee_details.destroy_all
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                # 创建新关联
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                fee_detail_ids.each do |fee_detail_id|
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                  fee_detail = FeeDetail.find_by(id: fee_detail_id)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                  next unless fee_detail
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                  
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                  # 确保费用明细属于同一个报销单
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                  next unless fee_detail.document_number == @work_order.reimbursement.invoice_number
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                  
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                  # 创建关联
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  WorkOrderFeeDetail.create!(
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    work_order: @work_order,
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                    fee_detail: fee_detail,
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                    work_order_type: @work_order.type
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  )
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                end
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

              end
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

              
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

              def assign_shared_attributes(params)
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#assign_shared_attributes: 开始分配属性，参数: #{params.inspect}"
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                shared_attr_keys = [
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                  :processing_opinion, :audit_comment,
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  :problem_type_id, :fee_type_id,
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                  # AuditWorkOrder specific fields that are now shared due to alignment
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                  :audit_result # audit_result if it's set directly, though status implies it
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                                               # For CommunicationWorkOrder, these would be nil or handled by model defaults if any
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                ]
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#assign_shared_attributes: 共享属性键: #{shared_attr_keys.inspect}"
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                attrs_to_assign = params.slice(*shared_attr_keys.select { |key| params.key?(key) })
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#assign_shared_attributes: 要分配的属性: #{attrs_to_assign.inspect}"
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                # Ensure audit_result is not directly assigned if it's purely driven by status
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                # If audit_result is a direct input field (e.g. from a form for specific cases), this is fine.
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                # But our current design: status implies audit_result ('approved'/'rejected')
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                attrs_to_assign.delete(:audit_result) # Let status dictate this, model has audit_result column for db persistence
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                # Handle fee_type_id separately - it's not directly stored but used to filter problem_types
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                fee_type_id = attrs_to_assign.delete(:fee_type_id)
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#assign_shared_attributes: 费用类型ID: #{fee_type_id.inspect}"
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                submitted_fee_detail_ids = attrs_to_assign.delete(:submitted_fee_detail_ids)
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#assign_shared_attributes: 提交的费用明细IDs: #{submitted_fee_detail_ids.inspect}"
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                # Assign the remaining attributes
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                if attrs_to_assign.present?
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#assign_shared_attributes: 分配剩余属性: #{attrs_to_assign.inspect}"
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                  @work_order.assign_attributes(attrs_to_assign)
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                end
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                # 处理费用明细选择
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                if submitted_fee_detail_ids.present?
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#assign_shared_attributes: 处理费用明细选择"
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                  process_fee_detail_selections(submitted_fee_detail_ids)
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                end
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                # 费用类型现在由选择的费用明细自动决定，不再需要单独处理 fee_type_id
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                # 保留 fee_type_id 变量以兼容旧代码，但不再使用它来设置默认问题类型
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                if fee_type_id.present?
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#assign_shared_attributes: 设置费用类型ID: #{fee_type_id}"
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

                  @work_order.fee_type_id = fee_type_id
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                else
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#assign_shared_attributes: 没有提供费用类型ID"
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                end
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "WorkOrderService#assign_shared_attributes: 分配属性完成，工单: #{@work_order.inspect}"
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                # 移除自动填充审核意见的代码
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                # 根据最新需求，审核意见完全由用户手动输入，不再自动填充
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

              end
          
      332.

            end

            class BatchImportManager
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              BATCH_SIZE = 1000  # 批量处理大小
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              attr_reader :model_class, :optimization_level, :sqlite_manager
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def initialize(model_class, optimization_level: :moderate)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @model_class = model_class
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @optimization_level = optimization_level
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @sqlite_manager = SqliteOptimizationManager.new(level: optimization_level)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                @performance_stats = {
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  total_processed: 0,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  batches_processed: 0,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  start_time: nil,
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  end_time: nil
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              end

              # 批量导入主方法
          
      20.

              def batch_import(data_array, &block)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                @performance_stats[:start_time] = Time.current
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                @performance_stats[:total_processed] = data_array.size
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting batch import for #{@model_class.name}: #{data_array.size} records"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                @sqlite_manager.during_import do
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  with_optimized_settings do
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    result = process_in_batches(data_array, &block)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    @performance_stats[:end_time] = Time.current
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    log_performance_summary
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    result
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              # 带回调禁用的批量导入
          
      37.

              def batch_import_with_disabled_callbacks(data_array, disabled_callbacks = [], &block)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                @performance_stats[:start_time] = Time.current
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                @performance_stats[:total_processed] = data_array.size
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting optimized batch import for #{@model_class.name}: #{data_array.size} records"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                @sqlite_manager.during_import do
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  with_disabled_callbacks(disabled_callbacks) do
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    result = process_in_batches(data_array, &block)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    @performance_stats[:end_time] = Time.current
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    log_performance_summary
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    result
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              # 批量插入新记录
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              def batch_insert(records_data)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                return 0 if records_data.empty?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # 添加时间戳
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                timestamped_data = records_data.map do |record|
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  record.merge(
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    created_at: Time.current,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    updated_at: Time.current
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  )
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                # 使用原始 SQL 插入来完全避免 ActiveRecord 回调
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                table_name = @model_class.table_name
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                columns = timestamped_data.first.keys
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                column_names = columns.join(', ')
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                # 构建批量插入的 SQL
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                values_sql = timestamped_data.map do |record|
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  values = columns.map { |col| ActiveRecord::Base.connection.quote(record[col]) }
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  "(#{values.join(', ')})"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                end.join(', ')
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                sql = "INSERT INTO #{table_name} (#{column_names}) VALUES #{values_sql}"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.connection.execute(sql)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Batch inserted #{records_data.size} #{@model_class.name} records using raw SQL"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                records_data.size
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              # 批量更新现有记录
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              def batch_update(records_data, unique_by: :id)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                return 0 if records_data.empty?
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                # 添加更新时间戳
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                timestamped_data = records_data.map do |record|
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  record.merge(updated_at: Time.current)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                @model_class.upsert_all(timestamped_data, unique_by: unique_by)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Batch updated #{records_data.size} #{@model_class.name} records"
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                records_data.size
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              # 批量查询现有记录
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              def batch_find_existing(field_name, values)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                return {} if values.empty?
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                @model_class.where(field_name => values.uniq)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                            .index_by { |record| record.send(field_name) }
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              # 获取性能统计
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              def performance_stats
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                return @performance_stats unless @performance_stats[:end_time]
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                duration = @performance_stats[:end_time] - @performance_stats[:start_time]
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                records_per_second = @performance_stats[:total_processed] / duration
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                @performance_stats.merge(
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  duration: duration.round(3),
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  records_per_second: records_per_second.round(2)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                )
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              private
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              def with_optimized_settings(&block)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                # 这里可以添加额外的优化设置
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                # 比如临时调整ActiveRecord的配置
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                original_logger_level = Rails.logger.level
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                begin
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  # 在批量导入期间减少日志输出
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.level = Logger::WARN if Rails.env.production?
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  yield
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                ensure
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.level = original_logger_level
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

              
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              def with_disabled_callbacks(disabled_callbacks, &block)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                return yield if disabled_callbacks.empty?
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                # 禁用指定的回调
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                disabled_callbacks.each do |callback_info|
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  callback_type, timing, method_name = callback_info
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  @model_class.skip_callback(callback_type, timing, method_name)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Disabled #{disabled_callbacks.size} callbacks for #{@model_class.name}"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                begin
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  yield
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                ensure
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  # 恢复回调
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  disabled_callbacks.each do |callback_info|
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    callback_type, timing, method_name = callback_info
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    @model_class.set_callback(callback_type, timing, method_name)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Restored #{disabled_callbacks.size} callbacks for #{@model_class.name}"
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

              
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

              def process_in_batches(data_array, &block)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                results = []
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                data_array.each_slice(BATCH_SIZE).with_index do |batch, batch_index|
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Processing batch #{batch_index + 1}/#{(data_array.size.to_f / BATCH_SIZE).ceil} (#{batch.size} records)"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  batch_result = ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    yield(batch)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  results << batch_result
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  @performance_stats[:batches_processed] += 1
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                results
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              def log_performance_summary
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                stats = performance_stats
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Batch import completed for #{@model_class.name}:"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "  - Total records: #{stats[:total_processed]}"
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "  - Batches processed: #{stats[:batches_processed]}"
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "  - Duration: #{stats[:duration]} seconds"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "  - Speed: #{stats[:records_per_second]} records/second"
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "  - Optimization level: #{@optimization_level}"
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            end
          
      186.

    lib/current.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    3 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 3 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # lib/current.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class Current < ActiveSupport::CurrentAttributes

            # lib/sqlite_optimization_manager.rb

            class SqliteOptimizationManager
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # 优化级别定义
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              SAFE_SETTINGS = {
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                cache_size: '10000',        # 增加缓存大小到10MB
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                temp_store: 'MEMORY'        # 临时表存储在内存中
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              }.freeze
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              MODERATE_SETTINGS = SAFE_SETTINGS.merge({
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                synchronous: 'NORMAL',      # 平衡性能和安全性
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                journal_mode: 'WAL',        # Write-Ahead Logging模式
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                foreign_keys: 'OFF'         # 导入期间关闭外键约束
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              }).freeze
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              AGGRESSIVE_SETTINGS = MODERATE_SETTINGS.merge({
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                synchronous: 'OFF',         # 关闭同步等待（高风险）
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                journal_mode: 'MEMORY',     # 日志存储在内存中（高风险）
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                cache_size: '20000'         # 增加缓存到20MB
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              }).freeze
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              attr_reader :connection, :original_settings, :level
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              def initialize(connection = ActiveRecord::Base.connection, level: :safe)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                @connection = connection
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                @level = level
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                @original_settings = {}
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                @settings = case level
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                            when :safe then SAFE_SETTINGS
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                            when :moderate then MODERATE_SETTINGS  
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                            when :aggressive then AGGRESSIVE_SETTINGS
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                            else raise ArgumentError, "Invalid optimization level: #{level}. Valid levels: :safe, :moderate, :aggressive"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                            end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              # 在导入期间应用优化设置，带性能监控
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              def during_import_with_monitoring(&block)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                return yield unless sqlite_database?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                # 根据优化级别决定是否需要备份
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                if requires_backup?
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  with_backup { perform_optimized_import(start_time, &block) }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                else
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  perform_optimized_import(start_time, &block)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              # 简化版本，仅应用优化设置
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              def during_import(&block)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                return yield unless sqlite_database?
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                apply_optimization_settings
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                begin
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  result = yield
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Import completed with #{@level} SQLite optimization"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  result
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                ensure
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  restore_original_settings
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              # 获取当前数据库信息
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              def database_info
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                return {} unless sqlite_database?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  adapter: @connection.adapter_name,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  database_path: database_path,
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  current_settings: current_pragma_settings,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  optimization_level: @level
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                }
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              private
          
      77.

      78.
